apps.title: تعلم اللغة الانجليزية بالعربي
apps.description:
تعلم اللغة الانجليزية مجانا بالعربي من الصفر وبوقت قصير مع برنامجنا الاكثر من رائع والذي سوف يساعدك على تعلم الانجليزية من الصفر وبشكل صحيح من خلال فهم تعليم قواعد اللغة الانجليزية والاصوات والمصطلحات وغيرها من الدروس .
البرنامج سوف يساعدك على بناء مخزون لغوي كبير من خلال حفظ المفردات الانجليزية والعبارات والمحادثات الاساسية لهذه اللغة العالمية حيث كلما كبر مخزونك اللغوي كلما كانت انجليزيتك اقوى واقوى. هذا البرنامج 
سوف يساعدك وبشكل كبير على ان تتحدث الانجليزية بأسرع وقت ممكن !! تعلم اللغة الانجليزية تعلم الانجليزية تعليم الانجليزية تعلم الانجليزي تعلم الانكليزية تعليم اللغة الانجليزية بسهولة من البدايه حتى الاحتراف تعلم اللغة الانجليزية للسفر تعلم اللغه الانجليزيه بالصوت مجانا
مهما كان هدفك من تعلم الانجليزية ومهما كان مستواك في اللغة الانجليزية فان هذا التطبيق سوف يكون رفيقك  الدائم .
مع هذا التطبيق سوف تتعلم وانت مرتاح لان كل ما تحتاج اليه من دروس تعلم اللغة الانجليزية سيكون موجود في هاتفك وبدون انترنت ومجاني مئة بالمئة. 

بفضل الله وحمده برنامجنا في المراكز الاولى في السعودية وامريكا والكويت والامارات العربية المتحدة وقطر والبحرين وغيرها من الدول وهذا دليل على مايحتويه البرنامج من معلومات شاملة ومفيدة لمتعلمي اللغة الانجليزية .

شاهد كل مميزات البرنامج والطريقة الصحيحة لاستخدام البرنامج في هذا الفيديو على اليوتيوب انسخ هذا الرابط المباشر
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iu2F9HljNG8

مميزات البرنامج
------- 
لسهولة استخدام البرنامج فقد تم تصنيف البرنامج في 18 قسم هي :
القواعد , الاصوات , المصطلحات , المفردات , العبارات , المحادثات , المرادفات , الاضداد , المختصرات , الافعال القياسية , الافعال الشاذة , شرح الفيديو , الاختبارات  النتائج , البحث ,  قوائم التشغيل (البلي ليست) , الناطق الصوتي , تصفح اون لاين
البرنامج يعمل بشكل كامل دون الحاجة الى الانترنت باستثناء قسم الفيديو فانك تحتاج الى الانترنت
جودة الصوت عالية جداً مع مراعاة سرعة نطق العبارة حيث ان جميع العبارات والمفردات تم تسجيلها من قبل شخص حقيقي متخصص 
جميع العبارات والمفردات والامثلة الموجودة في البرنامج مترجمة الى اللغة العربية لكي تكون الفائدة اكبر بحيث تفهم المعنى وتحفظ النطق الصحيح
البرنامج يقدم لك شرح مفصل لقواعد الانجليزية مع دعمها بالامثلة والصوت حيث يبدا معك من الاحرف الانجليزية ويتدرج معك الى دروس متقدمة جدا في اللغة
البرنامج كذلك يقدم لك شرح مفصل ووافي لاصوات اللغة الانجليزية الصحيحة وكذلك اصوات العلة مع دعمها بالامثلة
البرنامح يقدم لك اشهر مصطلحات اللغة الانجليزية على طبق من ذهب مع الامثلة المترجمة للعربية
البرنامح يقدم لك الافعال الشاذة مع دعمها باللفظ ولمختلف الحالات المضارع , الماضي والتصريف الثالث للفعل وكذلك طرق استخدام الفعل في جميع الازمنة
البرنامج يقدم لك اشهرالمرادفات الانجليزية والتي نستخدمها في حياتنا اليومية مع دعمها بالصوت والترجمة والاختبار
البرنامج يحتوي على عدد هائل من الكلمات الانجليزية و العبارات والمحادثات والتي هي الاهم لبناء اساس قوي وصحيح في هذه اللغة العالمية والاكثر استخدام في الحياة اليومية
حيث تم تصنيف اغلب الاقسام الرئيسية الى اقسام فرعية  لسهولة الوصول اليها 
دروس الفيديو : فكرة البرنامج ان نقدم لك برنامج لاتحتاج فيه الى الانترنت ولكن من المستحيل ادرج فيديو في البرنامج وذلك بسبب الحجم الكبير لملفات الفيديو لذلك وضعنا 
هذا القسم كقسم ثانوي تستطيع استخدمه في حال توفر الانترنت لديك  
البرنامج يحتوي على 3 انواع من الاختبارات 
- اختبار الاختيارات حيث يجب ان تختار جواب للسؤال من اربعة اختيارات
-اختبار الاملاء حيث يجب ان تكتب املاء الكلمة التي تسمعها
-اختبار المرادفات حيث يجب ان تكتب مرادفة للكلمة التي تظهر في السؤال
جميع الاختبارات تحفظ في قاعدة بيانات حيث يمكنك مشاهدة الاسئلة واجوبتك علية وكذلك الجواب الصحيح ودرجتك في الاختبار حيث تستطيع ان
تجري اختبارات بالقدر الذي تريد مع امكانية حذف الاختبارات من قاعدة البيانات في حال عدم رغبتك في الاحتفاظ بها
البرنامج يقدم لك خاصية البحث المتميزة حيث يمكنك ان تبحث عن اي مفردة من مفردات البرنامج سواء باللغة العربية او الانجليزية ونتائج البحث مدعومة بالصوت
اخيراً يمكنك مشاهدة نتائج اختباراتك من قسم النتائج ولن انسى ان اقول لك انه بامكانك ان تضيف الكلمة التي تعجبك الى المفضلة
تصور كل هذا في تطبيق واحد مجاني مئة بالمئة وبدون انترنت.  جرب التطبيق وتاكد بنفسك فالتجربة خير برهان .. جرب لن تخسر شي
رجاءأ لا تتردد في تقيم افضل برنامج عربي لتعليم اللغة الانجليزية

raw_data.releaseNotes: Bug fixes and stability improvements
raw_data.description:
تعلم اللغة الانجليزية مجانا بالعربي من الصفر وبوقت قصير مع برنامجنا الاكثر من رائع والذي سوف يساعدك على تعلم الانجليزية من الصفر وبشكل صحيح من خلال فهم تعليم قواعد اللغة الانجليزية والاصوات والمصطلحات وغيرها من الدروس .
البرنامج سوف يساعدك على بناء مخزون لغوي كبير من خلال حفظ المفردات الانجليزية والعبارات والمحادثات الاساسية لهذه اللغة العالمية حيث كلما كبر مخزونك اللغوي كلما كانت انجليزيتك اقوى واقوى. هذا البرنامج 
سوف يساعدك وبشكل كبير على ان تتحدث الانجليزية بأسرع وقت ممكن !! تعلم اللغة الانجليزية تعلم الانجليزية تعليم الانجليزية تعلم الانجليزي تعلم الانكليزية تعليم اللغة الانجليزية بسهولة من البدايه حتى الاحتراف تعلم اللغة الانجليزية للسفر تعلم اللغه الانجليزيه بالصوت مجانا
مهما كان هدفك من تعلم الانجليزية ومهما كان مستواك في اللغة الانجليزية فان هذا التطبيق سوف يكون رفيقك  الدائم .
مع هذا التطبيق سوف تتعلم وانت مرتاح لان كل ما تحتاج اليه من دروس تعلم اللغة الانجليزية سيكون موجود في هاتفك وبدون انترنت ومجاني مئة بالمئة. 

بفضل الله وحمده برنامجنا في المراكز الاولى في السعودية وامريكا والكويت والامارات العربية المتحدة وقطر والبحرين وغيرها من الدول وهذا دليل على مايحتويه البرنامج من معلومات شاملة ومفيدة لمتعلمي اللغة الانجليزية .

شاهد كل مميزات البرنامج والطريقة الصحيحة لاستخدام البرنامج في هذا الفيديو على اليوتيوب انسخ هذا الرابط المباشر
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iu2F9HljNG8

مميزات البرنامج
-------

apps.title: Khan Academy Kids
apps.description:
Make screen time more meaningful with Khan Academy Kids—the award-winning, educational app for kids ages 2–8. Packed with fun, standards-aligned reading games, math games, phonics lessons, and interactive storybooks, the app has helped over 21 million preschool and elementary students learn at home, at school, and on the go. Join Kodi the Bear and friends on exciting educational adventures that spark curiosity, build confidence, and inspire a lifelong love of learning. 

PLAY-BASED READING, MATH & MORE:
From ABC games and phonics practice to counting, addition, and shapes, kids can explore over 5,000 educational games and activities with Kodi’s friends:
• Ollo the Elephant – phonics and letter sounds
• Reya the Red Panda – storytime and writing
• Peck the Hummingbird – numbers and counting
• Sandy the Dingo – puzzles, memory, and problem-solving

AWARDS AND RECOGNITION:
With more than 180,000 5-star reviews, Khan Academy Kids has won the hearts of families and educators worldwide. 
• “Best kids app EVER”
• “It’s 100% free and my kids learn so much!”
• “If you’re looking for a HIGH quality app for your kids, this is it!”

Recognition includes:
• Common Sense Media – Top Rated Educational App
• Children’s Technology Review – Editor’s Choice
• Parents’ Choice – Gold Award Winner
• Apple App Store – Editor’s Choice

A LIBRARY OF STORYBOOKS AND VIDEOS:
• Discover hundreds of kids’ books and videos for preschool, kindergarten and early elementary.
• Explore animals, dinosaurs, science, and more with non-fiction books from National Geographic and Bellwether Media. 
• Choose “Read To Me” for read-aloud storybooks in English or Spanish. 
• Dance and sing-along with videos from Super Simple Songs! 

FROM PRESCHOOL TO 2ND GRADE:
Khan Academy Kids grows with your child, from age 2 through 8 and beyond:
• Preschool learning games build foundational reading, math, and life skills.
• Kindergarten activities cover phonics, sight words, writing, and early math.
• 1st and 2nd grade lessons strengthen reading comprehension, problem-solving, and confidence.

SAFE, TRUSTED, AND ALWAYS FREE:
Created in partnership with the Stanford Graduate School of Education by education experts, aligned with Head Start and Common Core Standards, COPPA-compliant, and 100% free—no ads, no subscriptions. Khan Academy is a nonprofit with the mission to provide a free, world-class education for anyone, anywhere.

LEARN ANYWHERE—AT HOME, AT SCHOOL, EVEN OFFLINE:
• At home: Khan Academy Kids is the perfect learning app for families at home. From sleepy mornings to road trips, kids and families love learning with Khan Kids. 
For homeschool: Families that homeschool also enjoy our standards-aligned, educational kids games and lessons for kids.
• At school: In-app Teacher Tools help preschool and elementary school teachers create assignments, track student progress, and make the most of small-group and whole-group learning.
• On the go: No wifi? No problem! Download books and games for learning on the go. Perfect for car trips, waiting rooms, or cozy mornings at home.

START YOUR LEARNING ADVENTURE TODAY
Download Khan Academy Kids and watch your child discover, play, and grow. 

JOIN OUR COMMUNITIES FOR FAMILIES AND TEACHERS
Follow @khankids on Instagram, TikTok, and YouTube. 

KHAN ACADEMY:
Khan Academy is a 501(c)(3) nonprofit organization with the mission to provide a free, world-class education to anyone, anywhere. Khan Academy Kids was created by early learning experts from Duck Duck Moose who created 22 preschool games and won 22 Parents’ Choice Awards, 19 Children’s Technology Review Awards and a KAPi award for Best Children’s App. Khan Academy Kids is 100% free with no ads or subscriptions.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
Our Halloween update has arrived! Celebrate the season with spook-tacular festive artwork and activities for kids to enjoy.

• A Halloween-themed home screen featuring Kodi and friends in costume
• Themed books, videos, and songs about owls, pumpkins, spiders, and more
• Halloween-inspired lessons in Letters, Reading, Math, Logic+, and Create
• Coloring pages, matching games, and scene creation activities

Don’t celebrate Halloween? You can disable the theme in the Parent or Teacher Settings. 

Thanks for learning with us!

apps.title: Noon Academy
apps.description:
On Noon Academy, you can learn with top teachers and friends, live. Get help when you need it, ask questions anytime, and build confidence to crush your exams!

Best teachers: Learn from the best teachers around, including the ones you already know from your tuition center. They give simple explanations that actually make sense, so you can finally get the tough stuff!

Interactive Live Classes: Tired of boring videos where no one’s around to help? Join live classes where you can ask questions anytime in chat or microphone. Whether you’re stuck on a concept or just listening in, your teacher and classmates are there to support you, making learning more fun.

Practice: During and after class, try real exam questions to see how much you’ve understood. You’ll get better and feel ready to ace the tests—no more cramming last minute!

Terms of use: https://www.noonacademy.com/terms

apps.title: EM:RAP - Medical Education
apps.description:
Join 65,000 of your colleagues and subscribe to the #1 online medical education platform in the world. Gone are the days when you had to buy multiple products from different vendors. With EM:RAP you gain access to everything you will ever need throughout your career, all for one low price.
Because what you do matters!

AUDIO PODCASTS
Our emergency medicine, urgent care, and primary care audio programs have something for everyone. Just starting out? Our Comprehensive Core Curriculum (C3) has you covered for all of the most common presentations to the Emergency Department and Urgent Care. More of a seasoned vet? There is a reason our flagship EM:RAP podcast is the #1 EM audio program: it is full of cutting-edge updates from the specialty’s leading voices. Looking to expand your Urgent Care knowledge? UC Max has you covered!

HD VIDEOS
Can’t remember exactly how to execute that tricky procedure? Have no fear, our HD video section is filled with expertly-shot procedure videos and expert commentary. We also regularly host live shows to cover topics of interest. Additionally, we are building a robust library of video courses and lectures so you visual learners can deep dive into specific topics of interest.

BOARD REVIEW
Our Crunch Time audio product is a comprehensive board review course for MDs, RNs, PAs, NPs, and students of all types. We even have separate versions for both Emergency Medicine and Family Medicine!

LIFELONG LEARNING AND SELF-ASSESSMENT (LLSA)
Our reviews of LLSA papers cut straight to the chase. Listen to the audio and take the attached quiz, and you’ll be ready to ace the ABEM LLSA exam!

LITERATURE REVIEWS
Our Emergency Medical Abstracts team analyzes over 600 papers each month, so you don’t have to! And we dissect and summarize the best of these abstracts so you have the very best-available information for your practice.

PRIMARY CARE
Right on Prime is our comprehensive monthly audio series for the generalist. Primary care, urgent care, low-risk obstetrics, pediatrics, rural, remote and international medicine, paper reviews, and much more!

URGENT CARE
UC Maximus has revolutionized Urgent Care education. Your membership unlocks exclusive access to a comprehensive suite of UC educational products.

ABOUT EM:RAP
For twenty years, Emergency Medicine: Reviews and Perspectives (EM:RAP) has provided the EM community with the highest-quality medical education resources. Now the leaders in the field, the name EM:RAP has become synonymous with EM education. EM:RAP’s UC Maximus platform will do the same for Urgent Care. Our goal is to provide you with a one-stop for all your educational needs. With your EM:RAP subscription you gain access to everything you will ever need throughout your career, all for one low price.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
raw_data.releaseNotes:
Have you ever opened our app and stared blankly at the screen while trying to remember what you’d been listening to just a moment ago? Was it an EM:RAP chapter on sickle cell disease? Could it have been a UC Max chapter on the SHAAKE assessment? Now that you think about it, it could have been from C3—pediatric abdominal pain, maybe. Whatever it was, the telephone call from your mother-in-law reminding you it’s your turn to bring the Jell-O salad for Sunday dinner threw you for a loop and now you’re no longer sure where you left off.

Don’t worry. We here at EM:RAP routinely forget why we’ve walked into a room, where we’ve left our phones—or even that we were supposed to pick up the kids from school an hour ago. It’s human nature. And to help deal with human nature, we’ve added a new feature to the iOS app. Now when you start the app, it will launch the mini player preloaded with the last thing you listened to, but which you haven’t yet finished. We’ve also snuck in a few small bug fixes under the hood to keep the app humming along as usual.

It’s just one more way EM:RAP has your back, so give it a shot! Oh, and don’t forget to bring that Jell-O salad on Sunday. We’d hate to see you arrive empty-handed.
raw_data.description:
Join 65,000 of your colleagues and subscribe to the #1 online medical education platform in the world. Gone are the days when you had to buy multiple products from different vendors. With EM:RAP you gain access to everything you will ever need throughout your career, all for one low price.
Because what you do matters!

AUDIO PODCASTS
Our emergency medicine, urgent care, and primary care audio programs have something for everyone. Just starting out? Our Comprehensive Core Curriculum (C3) has you covered for all of the most common presentations to the Emergency Department and Urgent Care. More of a seasoned vet? There is a reason our flagship EM:RAP podcast is the #1 EM audio program: it is full of cutting-edge updates from the specialty’s leading voices. Looking to expand your Urgent Care knowledge? UC Max has you covered!

HD VIDEOS
Can’t remember exactly how to execute that tricky procedure? Have no fear, our HD video section is filled with expertly-shot procedure videos and expert commentary. We also regularly host live shows to cover topics of interest. Additionally, we are building a robust library of video courses and lectures so you visual learners can deep dive into specific topics of interest.

BOARD REVIEW
Our Crunch Time audio product is a comprehensive board review course for MDs, RNs, PAs, NPs, and students of all types. We even have separate versions for both Emergency Medicine and Family Medicine!

LIFELONG LEARNING AND SELF-ASSESSMENT (LLSA)
Our reviews of LLSA papers cut straight to the chase. Listen to the audio and take the attached quiz, and you’ll be ready to ace the ABEM LLSA exam!

LITERATURE REVIEWS
Our Emergency Medical Abstracts team analyzes over 600 papers each month, so you don’t have to! And we dissect and summarize the best of these abstracts so you have the very best-available information for your practice.

PRIMARY CARE
Right on Prime is our comprehensive monthly audio series for the generalist. Primary care, urgent care, low-risk obstetrics, pediatrics, rural, remote and international medicine, paper reviews, and much more!

URGENT CARE
UC Maximus has revolutionized Urgent Care education. Your membership unlocks exclusive access to a comprehensive suite of UC educational products.

ABOUT EM:RAP
For twenty years, Emergency Medicine: Reviews and Perspectives (EM:RAP) has provided the EM community with the highest-quality medical education resources. Now the leaders in the field, the name EM:RAP has become synonymous with EM education. EM:RAP’s UC Maximus platform will do the same for Urgent Care. Our goal is to provide you with a one-stop for all your educational needs. With your EM:RAP subscription you gain access to everything you will ever need throughout your career, all for one low price.

apps.title: OnCourse Connect
apps.description:
The OnCourse Connect app provides convenient mobile access to the OnCourse Connect student portal on your phone or tablet. 


Students, parents and guardians can easily view grades, assignments, attendance, class schedules, school fees, student calendars and more. Manage push notifications of grade changes and other events. Parents and guardians can easily switch between multiple student accounts to stay up to date on all their students. 

If your district uses the OnCourse Classroom Learning Management System (LMS), the Connect mobile app integrates with the OnCourse Classroom mobile app so students can submit work, message teachers and more via their mobile device. 


PLEASE NOTE: 
Your school district must be using the OnCourse Student Information system for you to access the OnCourse Connect app. An OnCourse Connect account login is required to use this application. Contact your school or district for more information.

apps.title: New Educational Games for Kids
apps.description:
Welcome to New Educational Games for Kids – a world of safe, fun, and expertly designed learning games for children aged 1 to 5.

This app includes 21 thoughtfully crafted educational games to help your child learn and grow through play — all in one trusted place.

Kids will:
• Learn numbers, colors, and shapes
• Understand size, form, and patterns
• Develop logic, memory, focus, and motor skills
• Explore space, animals, vehicles, and more
• Be inspired by creative tasks like coloring and decorating

Game highlights:
• Pick a Vehicle – discover cars, boats, planes, and rockets
• Construct a Vehicle – boost creativity through building and driving
• Collect the Animals – practice logic and sorting
• Sounds of Animals – fun introduction to animal sounds
• What Comes Next? – boost critical thinking with simple patterns
• Amazing Space – explore colors, sizes, and our Solar System
• AR Toy Sorting – bring toys into your room with augmented reality!
• Join the Dots, Spot the Difference, Animal Puzzles, Feed the Animals, Clap Hands, and many more!

All games are fully voiced, ad-free, and designed with child safety in mind. We don’t collect or share any personal data.

Part of the Kidify Collection
This app is part of Kidify — a growing collection of 18 ad-free educational apps featuring over 80 learning games, 200+ coloring pages, puzzles, creative tools, and more — all available with one subscription.

Why parents love it:
• 21 safe and fun educational games in one app
• No ads, no interruptions
• Designed by early childhood experts
• Inspires curiosity and confidence
• Trusted by millions of families worldwide

Download New Educational Games for Kids and let your child play, learn, and grow in a joyful, creative environment.

The app features auto-renewable subscriptions. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. You can manage subscriptions and turn off auto-renewal at any time in Account Settings after purchase.

Please review our Privacy Policy: https://kidify.games/privacy-policy/
and Terms of Use: https://kidify.games/terms-of-use/

raw_data.releaseNotes: Thank you for learning through play with Kidify! This update includes important bug fixes and performance improvements to keep everything running smoothly.

apps.title: Smart Tales ® Learning Games
apps.description:
Give your child the tools to thrive in school, at home, and beyond and make screen time productive with fun, educational and non addictive games and stories.

With 2500+ interactive activities, award-winning stories, and science-backed games, Smart Tales® is the go-to learning app for kids aged 2 to 11. Whether you’re a parent, teacher, or caregiver, it’s built to support every learner—including neurodivergent children—with a focus on inclusivity and engagement.

“Smart Tales has been a game-changer. My child now asks to practice multiplication tables!”
“I love that I can track progress and feel confident it’s not just screen time—it’s real learning.”
“As a busy single mom, it’s the only app I trust when I need 20 focused minutes.”

What Smart Tales® Helps Your Child Achieve:

-Master MATH SKILLS and go beyond with addition, subtraction, multiplication, division & time tables
-Build a LOVE FOR READING with read-along stories and vocabulary-rich adventures
-Practice real-world SCIENCE: human body, space, nature, and fun experiments
-Strengthen LOGIC and REASONING through coding challenges and brain games
-Develop BETTER BEHAVIOR and emotional regulation through STORIES rooted in values and kindness
-Progress at their own pace with a personalized LEARNING PATH
-Learn anywhere with OFFLINE ACCESS and multi-device support

BUILT FOR ALL TYPES OF LEARNERS
Smart Tales® was crafted with inclusivity at its core, certified for kids on the autism spectrum and built to support neurodivergent learning styles. Whether your child is ahead, behind, or simply learns differently, Smart Tales® adapts to their needs.

AWARDS & RECOGNITION
**Apple App Store: 2025 Essential App for Kids
Mom’s Choice Award®
National Parenting Product Award
Academics’ Choice™ Brain Toy Award
Parent and Teacher Choice Award™
Kids Safe Certified
5 Stars – Educational App Store**

PROGRAMS THAT GROW WITH YOUR CHILD

READING PROGRAM
Nurture early literacy with phonics, read-alongs, sentence building, and story comprehension. Smart Tales® builds a love for reading by making every word part of an adventure.

MATH PROGRAM
From counting to multiplication and time tables, every activity is designed to strengthen core math skills through engaging, gamified lessons.

SCIENCE PROGRAM
Explore topics from animal facts and senses to geography, photosynthesis, and astronomy. Real-world learning, simplified and made fun.

FOR PARENTS AND TEACHERS
-Monitor learning with the Parent Area
-Set time limits, track achievements, and adjust difficulty
-Aligned to U.S. State Standards
-Created by educators, backed by child development research

Whether you’re prepping your preschooler for kindergarten, reinforcing classroom learning, or just looking for smarter screen time, Smart Tales® gives your child a solid educational foundation—and makes them love learning.

Download Smart Tales® today—where every tap leads to growth.

Let's keep in touch!
hello@smarttales.app
support@smart-tales.freshdesk.com
Visit our website: smarttales.app

Terms of Service: https://smarttales.app/terms-and-conditions/

apps.title: Toddler Games for 3 Year Olds~
apps.description:
Welcome to Ocean Preschool. Play over 500+ kids learning games such as coloring, puzzles, sorting, tracing, number learning games, popping bubbles, joining the dots, dressing up, matching the pairs, and much more which will help to improve the fine motor skills and cognitive skills of your child. All of these games will help build a positive approach and improve hand-eye coordination, logical thinking & creativity of your child. 

The underwater theme in this game has different objects like ships, treasure boxes, pirate hats, water animals like a variety of fishes, turtles, mermaids and much more! These games are filled with colorful graphics and fun animations which will encourage your child to learn more!

The best part about baby & toddler games for 2-4 year olds is, it is completely ad-free and safe for kids! It provides a safe environment for kids to learn without any ads. Indulge your child into this fun app and let them learn in the most fun way.
 
Features of this game are:
- Ideal For Preschool Kids
These games are ideal for kids in the preschool level 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 year olds. Kids will learn animals, numbers, shapes, colors, and much more!
 
- Child Friendly
All the games in this app are completely kid-friendly. Toddlers can play them easily.
 
- Available Offline & No Ads
These games can be played anytime and anywhere without the internet. Completely ad-free.
 
- Cute Characters & Animations
Delight your kids with our cute and colorful characters and funny interactive animations.

Subscription Details: US $7.99/month or US $59.99/year.
-Payment will be charged to Apple Account at confirmation of purchase.
-Cancel subscription renewal anytime under Subscriptions in your App Store Settings.
-Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renewal is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.
-No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during an active subscription period.

 
Privacy Policy: http://www.kidlo.com/privacypolicy.php
Terms of service: http://www.kidlo.com/terms_of_service.php
If you need help or have any feedback, email us at support@kidlo.com
 
Make your child learn and have lots of fun with this interactive game. Enjoy puzzles, alphabet, numbers, popping bubbles, join the dots, dress up, match the pairs, sorting, tracing games. Start your toddler's fun learning journey with Ocean Preschool today!

apps.title: ManageBac
apps.description:
ManageBac is built for students, parents, teachers, admins and coordinators on-the-go!

With multi-curricula support for the full IB Continuum (PYP, MYP, CP, DP), IGCSEs and universally with a Build-your-Own (BYO) model.

Students:
• Stay organised with key academic deadlines and assessment tasks.
• Set goals and build a portfolio with coursework, photos and more.
• Manage CAS or service-learning activities with reflections.
• Plan projects and communicate with your teachers & advisors.
• Browse and reference QuickStart guides for the IB to stay one step ahead.

Teachers:
• Collaboratively plan your curriculum.
• Manage teaching and learning with Stream & Resources.
• Share experiences and goal-setting within the Portfolio.
• Mark tasks, annotate coursework and submit term grades.
• Record attendance and Behaviour & Discipline.

Coordinators:
• Plan and organise key year group deadlines.
• Manage service learning & project-based learning.
• Manage exams from start to finish.
• Analyse your curriculum and manage term reporting.

Parents:
• Browse the curriculum alongside teaching & learning within the Portfolio.
• Monitor academic progress with grades, teacher comments, and report cards.
• Submit attendance excusals and communicate with homeroom advisors.
• Collaborate with fellow parents via the Parent-Teacher Association.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
We’re excited to introduce Standards Tagging on the Class Stream, a new way for teachers to connect student work on the Class Stream directly to Units and Curriculum Standards. This creates a connection between the Learning Outcomes covered in the class and students’ evidence of learning.

Teachers can tag any standards available on ManageBac, including IB, PYP Scope & Sequences, Pearson, Cambridge, and all Atlas Standards, ensuring comprehensive coverage across programmes. By tagging standards, teachers can highlight the skills and competencies demonstrated by students, creating a clear connection between teaching and learning.

Together, these updates empower teachers to connect learning to the curriculum, identify gaps in skill development, and gain meaningful insights into student progress.

apps.title: LingoAce for Student
apps.description:
Inspire Young Learners with Live Online Classes for Chinese, English, Math & More.

LingoAce is an award-winning online learning platform offering engaging, personalized instruction in Mandarin Chinese, English and Math for kids ages 3–15. With 20M+ live classes delivered to students in 110+ countries, we connect young learners with professionally certified teachers – anytime, anywhere.

Whether your child is just starting out or aiming for academic excellence, LingoAce helps them build confidence, fluency, and critical thinking skills through immersive, expert-led lessons.

LingoAce Chinese
The best way for kids to learn Mandarin Chinese
Designed for ages 3–15, our research-based curriculum helps children speak, listen, read, and write in Chinese with confidence.

Why families love it:
- Live 1-on-1 or group classes with native, accredited Chinese teachers
- Curriculum aligned with HSK, AP Chinese, and global language standards
- Interactive courseware with games, picture books & fun homework
- Supports all levels & bilingual backgrounds

LingoAce English
Build real fluency with native English teachers
For learners ages 4–11, our English program combines proven techniques and native-speaking teachers to spark language growth.

Program highlights:
- TEFL-certified British & American teachers with TPR techniques
- Curriculum aligned with CEFR language standards
- Engaging storytelling, gamified practice & closed-loop review
- Helps children excel in listening, speaking, reading, and writing

LingoAce Math
Master math with the proven Singapore Math method
Ideal for ages 5–15, our Math program strengthens logic and analytical skills in a fun, collaborative way.

Why parents choose LingoAce Math:
- Developed by the Stanford Doctor
- Aligns with US CCSS standards
- Small class sizes (max 6 students) for personalized learning
- Prepares for Olympiad Math and academic excellence

About Us
Founded in 2017, LingoAce is a global edtech company headquartered in Singapore with teams across the US, Europe, China, and Southeast Asia. We have over 5,000 certified teachers and are proud to have taught more than 20 million classes to PreK-12 learners worldwide.

Recognized by:
- Fast Company’s World’s Most Innovative Companies (2023)
- GSV EdTech 150 (2022 & 2023)

Support & Contact
Website: www.lingoace.com
Email: welcome@lingoace.com
Follow us:
- Facebook: LingoAce Global
- Instagram: @lingoaceus
- Twitter: @LingoAce

Love our app? Leave us a review – we’d love to hear from you!

apps.title: PRONOTE
apps.description:
PRONOTE incorporates all domains of academia: grades, competences, report cards, scheduling, attendance, tardiness, sanctions, orientation, homework notebooks, exercises, multiple choice questions, school agenda, infirmary, learning outcomes, multi-annual monitoring, student files, grade school certificate, internships, school road safety certificate…

From their smartphones, Students, Parents and Teachers access their data in real time, in a secure environment, wherever they are.
The students always know where they stand, the parents are reassured, the teachers have a broader prospective of their students.
PRONOTE mobile is also contextual messaging that links all the actors of the institution: every event is announced by a notification (message, information and surveys, digital locker, etc.) for everyone’s benefit.

Today, PRONOTE has become the reference in student administration: thousands of institutions use this platform to communicate and millions of users consult their Web Space every day.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
- Bug fixes
- Zoom control

apps.title: Flashcard English Educational
apps.description:
Dive into a world where learning meets fun with "Flashcard English Educational" – the perfect app for learners of all ages, both adults and kids alike. This engaging educational tool is your key to unlocking a new realm of knowledge, designed to make learning both powerful and simple through a variety of interactive games. With flashcards, image-to-word matchups, memory challenges, and spelling games, our app supports your educational journey with vibrant pictures, captivating photos, and clear sounds and phonics. Covering an expanded range of categories including Pet & Farm Animals, Wild Animals, Vehicles, Home Equipment, Foods, and Fruits, we aim to enrich your vocabulary and understanding in a fun way.

Features of Flashcard English Educational:

Expansive Learning Categories: Engage with 6 diverse categories – Pet & Farm Animals, Wild Animals, Vehicles, Home Equipment, Foods, and Fruits. Each category is filled with high-quality images and sounds designed to enhance your learning experience.

4-in-1 Games: Enjoy a suite of games that include Flashcards, Image to Word, Memory Match, and Spelling Games. These games are tailored to help improve your language skills in an interactive and enjoyable manner.

Quality Audiovisuals: Delight in the high-quality photos and amazing sounds across all categories. From the soothing sounds of animals to the bustling noises of vehicles, our app brings each word to life.

Interactive Challenges: Dive into fun and addictive puzzles that not only train your brain but also improve memory and concentration. It's educational entertainment at its best.

User-Friendly Design: With a super friendly user interface, our app is easy to navigate for learners of all ages, making education accessible and enjoyable for everyone.

Enhanced Word Recognition: Learn word recognition through listening to the sounds of animals, objects, and more. It's a dynamic way to build your vocabulary and master new words.

For Every Learner: No matter your age, whether you're an adult, teen, or kid, our app offers fun and educational games suited for all.

Transform learning into an enjoyable experience with "Flashcard English Educational". It's the perfect way to learn on the go, offering you and your children the opportunity to have fun, learn, and spend quality time together.

It's time to start your enjoyable learning journey. Install now! Our app is completely FREE, with ads allowing you to enjoy the full experience without any in-app purchases.

We Value Your Feedback: If you enjoy our app, please take a moment to rate and review us on the App Store. Your feedback helps us improve and continue offering the best educational experiences. Thank you for choosing "Flashcard English Educational" for your learning adventure!

apps.title: Grantmakers For Education
apps.description:
Grantmakers for Education (EdFunders) is the nation’s largest community of education philanthropists. Centering racial justice in education, we serve as a hub for new connections and ideas, a compass to help members navigate their work, a spur for collective action and a champion for positive change in education. 

Highly rated year after year, our annual conferences unite funders and experts in exploration of the deep and sometimes thorny education and philanthropic issues on the horizon. 

For more information, please contact us at information@edfunders.org.

apps.title: Educational games kids 2-3-4-5
apps.developer: Kids Academy Co apps: Preschool & Kindergarten Learning Kids Games, Educational Books, Free Songs
apps.description:
*** 15 learning games for toddlers & kids
*** SORT, MATCH, AND CLASSIFY by shape, size, color and much more
*** Developed with certified child psychologists


About the game:
-----------------
TinyHands Sorting 3 is the third game in our Sorting series.
Like the other two games of this series, this game teaches about sorting, 
but it also contains more complex sorting environments such as sorting by concept combinations and contextual clasification.
It is recommended for children of age 3 and up.

The game is designed to enhance the following skills:
- Sorting and classifying
- Hand-eye coordination
- Concentration
- Visual perception
- Vocabulary

Game Boards:
------------
The game consists of 12 boards ordered in an ascending level of difficulty.
The boards were carefully chosen in order to represent basic concepts from the child's world.

Load the truck: Sort by SHAPE and SIZE.
On a Tree: Sort between Monkeys, Birds and Hedgehogs
Dress the Monsters: COUNT to 3 and dress cute monsters
Going to Space: Classify by SHAPE and COLOR.
Penguins: Sort Penguins by SHAPE
Dishes: Sort kitchenware in the cupboard.
The Beatles:  COUNT to 3 and sort between cute beetles.
The Pirates: SORT by TWO COLOR COMBINATIONS
The Eskimos:  SORT by COLOR and SIZE
At the Beach: SORT by TWO and THREE COLOR COMBINATIONS
Professions: SORT objects to the right person according to his PROFESSION
Tools: SORT objects to the right elephant according to his ACTIVITY

TinyHands Games:
 
TinyHands Sorting Series
A set of sorting games designed to help children acquire basic concepts such as shape, color, size seasons and animals. Game boards are organized in an ascending difficulty level starting from basic sorting followed by more complex context based sorting and classification environments.

TinyHands Towers Series
A set of stacking games. The game is designed to help children acquire basic concepts such as: big VS. small, before VS. after, and bottom VS. top. Game boards are organized in an ascending difficulty level.

TinyHands What's My Pair Series
A series of three pair matching games. The game challenges the child to match pairs, initially based on visual aspects alone and in more advanced screens based on logic and understanding of card content.

TinyHands First Words Series
A set of vocabulary games for children of age 1.5 and up.
The game consists of 10 boards, each focused on a different theme from the child's world such as shapes, colors, clothes, animals and vehicles.

TinyHands Raccoon TreeHouse
This game is intended for toddlers aged 3+. The game presents 12 boards each focused on developing a set of basic concepts such as size, colors, numbers and patterns using everyday objects from the child's world such as clothes, food and many more.

TinyHands Town Center
Educational game recommended for age 3+. This game includes 10 beautiful boards each focused on developing a set of basic concepts such as size, colors, numbers and patterns using everyday objects from the child's world such as clothes, food and many more.

TinyHands Connect The Dots
The game consists of 12 mini game boards each presents a beautiful and magical scene. Each board contains several parts. The parts can be completed by connecting the numbered dots in a specific order. Upon completion, each part is dragged to gradually build an object. When all parts are drawn the scene is magically created and revealed. Designed for children aged 3+.

Note for parents:
Like all our games, this game is designed to provide quality playtime for parents and children together. Playing along with your children is highly recommended and will surely make them benefit the most from this app and help them expand their vocabulary.

We are sure that your children will enjoy this exciting educational game that will encourage their thinking and contribute to the development of their basic skills.

apps.title: mozaik3D - Explore & Learn
apps.description:
Let’s make learning fun! 

mozaik3D brings learning to life with interactive 3D models and a wide variety of digital resources. Perfect for students, teachers, and anyone curious about the world! 

- Explore 1300+ interactive 3D scenes across history, science, technology, mathematics, arts and more. 
- Digital lessons, images, videos, audio, and tools — everything you need for a richer learning experience. 
- Quizzes and activities to test knowledge in a fun way. 
- Narrations and animations to guide you through complex topics. 
- Walk mode & VR mode — step inside ancient cities, explore the human body, or travel to outer space. 

mozaik3D is available in over 40 languages, making it a perfect companion for both learning and practicing foreign languages. 

Try the app for free: explore demo scenes without registration, or create a free account and unlock 5 educational 3D scenes every week. 

Turn learning into an adventure — anytime, anywhere!

apps.title: Eggbun: Learn Korean Fun
apps.description:
Learn & practice your speaking, reading, listening and Korean writing skills with Lanny – the chatbot tutor. Have a chatbot tutor in your pocket!

---

Looking for a live chatbot app to learn the Korean language? Want 1 Korean learning chat app to learn & practice:

.. Korean reading

.. Korean writing

.. Korean vocabulary

.. Korean speaking

Well, you need Eggbun, the Korean language learning chatbot. With 1,000,000+ users worldwide, Eggbun is the most popular way to learn Korean language!

LEARN WITH Lanny – THE CHATBOT TUTOR

It’s a fun chat Korean app that allows you to practice your speaking, reading, listening and Korean writing skills… all by chat. Get started by chatting with your personal chatbot tutor, Lanny, and get access to 550+ Korean lessons, whether it’s Korean for beginners or advanced language learners. With Lanny in your pocket, you can learn Korean online anytime, anywhere!


WHY YOU’LL LOVE EGGBUN

Neatly organized, beautifully designed and fun, the Korean live chat app allows you to…

- Get Korean language basics in one place - Start with learning Hangeul, basic verbs, phrases, and sentences!

- Actually communicate in South Korean language - All the phrases and words for travel in Korea that you need to know, ordering guides and even the occasional K-drama reference. We believe that context is the best way to learn.

- Talk like a native speaker - It's not just text, but audio to help you with pronunciation too! Eggbun Korean language tutorials include audio by native Korean speakers that are sure to help you with your Korean speaking & Korean vocabulary.

- Get a strong understanding of Korean culture - Eggbun has Culture Notes to help you really understand and learn Korean culture! It’s like you have an ability to chat with Korean people and you probably know that learning Korean is much easier when done through chatting.

And all this is designed in the simplest UI you’ll ever see in a Learning Korean app.. we can guarantee that!

EASY PROCESS TO GET STARTED

Download and sign up via the popular email & social media networks with one click. Explore categories like Korean characters, greeting expressions, pronunciations, real-life conversations, common verb endings, business, and more, but don’t forget to especially check the Survival Korean for Travelers series.

Everything is made to be fun, fast and conversational, yet memorable and effective!

All your progress is tied to your account, so you can come back and continue your learning process at any time & anywhere.

Don’t miss the opportunity to finally learn this amazing language.

Learning with Eggbun is like having a Korean language school… on your phone.

Download the ultimate chat Korean bot to:

.. learn to speak Korean

.. learn to write Korean

.. understand Korean

NOTE:

If you have any questions or suggestions, please contact us at help@eggbun-edu.com.

Website: https://web.eggbun.net
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/eggbun_education
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/eggbun.edu
--------------------
Privacy: https://web.eggbun.net/privacy
Terms of Use: https://web.eggbun.net/terms-of-use

apps.title: 小猿AI - 原小猿口算检查作业神器
apps.developer: Beijing Yuanli Science and Technology Co., Ltd.
apps.description:
※※ App简介 ※※
「小猿AI（原小猿口算APP）」是一款专为中小学生打造的教育AI。AI赋能帮助家长、老师减轻作业检查负担。小猿AI不仅是一个APP，更是通过AI技术深度重构学习流程的教育AI伙伴。

对学生：从“被动学习”到“主动攻克”，AI让成长路径清晰可见。
对家长：从“焦虑陪读”到“科学监督”，节省时间并降低亲子冲突。
对教师：从“重复劳动”到“精准教学”，赋能课堂效率提升。

小猿AI隶属于猿辅导在线教育旗下。猿辅导在线教育，全国中小学生和家长优选的在线教育品牌。公司旗下拥有猿辅导、小猿AI、小猿搜题、斑马AI学等多款在线教育产品，为用户提供网课、智能练习、难题解析等多元化的智能教育服务，帮助学生系统性、高效率的完成学习闭环。

※※ 功能介绍 ※※
#小猿AI核心价值：AI深度赋能学习全流程，解决学习痛点，重塑高效学习。
「小猿AI = 省心家长 + 高效学习」
对孩子：学习变有趣，错题有人教，学习提升快。
对家长：每天少焦虑，辅导更科学，亲子少冲突。

一、 精准解决“作业场景”刚需，从“工具”到“AI学习伙伴”的升级
#传统工具局限：仅提供答案，缺乏深度解析。
#家长和学生痛点：辅导作业耗时耗力，错题无人讲解反复错、知识点模糊。
#小猿AI的价值
1秒批改作业**只需对作业拍照，即可一秒判断对错，支持超100种数学题型，另新增语文作文错别字和语法纠错。
AI错因分析**区分“知识性错误”、“习惯性错误”等，针对性生成改进方案和解题要点。
1对1讲题**AI老师24小时在线答疑，解析解题逻辑，并用追问式引导，培养学生独立思考的能力。
双师视频讲题**覆盖1.4亿+题目视频，“真人+AI”双讲解模式，既有真人老师分步解析讲解，也有AI讲解，总有一种讲法适合你。

二、 课内学习全闭环：预习+同步练，让孩子主动学、高效练
#家长痛点一次性解决
预习没效果**孩子随便翻书应付，上课听不懂。
练习不对标**买的练习题和学校教的不一致，白费时间。
计算练不动**催孩子练口算就闹脾气，亲子关系紧张。
#小猿AI一站式解决
AI课内预习**智能拆解教材重难点，通过引导式讲解+互动问答提前化解理解障碍，AI带你一步步走进课本。
AI精准练习**100%匹配校内教材，学完一课练一课，AI根据学习历史数据精准匹配题目，只练薄弱点，拒绝无效刷题。
更多校内练习**课文点读、竖式计算、单位换算、听算练习、字词听写、语文作文、必备古诗、试卷下载、课文背诵、背单词、单词听写、口语练习、拍照翻译、作文批改等。
口算PK**实时对战口算PK，勋章与班级排名激发竞争意识，让孩子爱上练口算。

三、情感价值赋能：让学习有温度，成长不孤单，孩子的24小时暖心伙伴
#传统工具缺失：冷冰冰的题库，缺乏动力和情感陪伴。
#小猿AI的突破

※※ App简介 ※※
「小猿AI（原小猿口算APP）」是一款专为中小学生打造的教育AI。AI赋能帮助家长、老师减轻作业检查负担。小猿AI不仅是一个APP，更是通过AI技术深度重构学习流程的教育AI伙伴。

对学生：从“被动学习”到“主动攻克”，AI让成长路径清晰可见。
对家长：从“焦虑陪读”到“科学监督”，节省时间并降低亲子冲突。
对教师：从“重复劳动”到“精准教学”，赋能课堂效率提升。

小猿AI隶属于猿辅导在线教育旗下。猿辅导在线教育，全国中小学生和家长优选的在线教育品牌。公司旗下拥有猿辅导、小猿AI、小猿搜题、斑马AI学等多款在线教育产品，为用户提供网课、智能练习、难题解析等多元化的智能教育服务，帮助学生系统性、高效率的完成学习闭环。

※※ 功能介绍 ※※
#小猿AI核心价值：AI深度赋能学习全流程，解决学习痛点，重塑高效学习。
「小猿AI = 省心家长 + 高效学习」
对孩子：学习变有趣，错题有人教，学习提升快。
对家长：每天少焦虑，辅导更科学，亲子少冲突。

一、 精准解决“作业场景”刚需，从“工具”到“AI学习伙伴”的升级
#传统工具局限：仅提供答案，缺乏深度解析。
#家长和学生痛点：辅导作业耗时耗力，错题无人讲解反复错、知识点模糊。
#小猿AI的价值
1秒批改作业**只需对作业拍照，即可一秒判断对错，支持超100种数学题型，另新增语文作文错别字和语法纠错。
AI错因分析**区分“知识性错误”、“习惯性错误”等，针对性生成改进方案和解题要点。
1对1讲题**AI老师24小时在线答疑，解析解题逻辑，并用追问式引导，培养学生独立思考的能力。
双师视频讲题**覆盖1.4亿+题目视频，“真人+AI”双讲解模式，既有真人老师分步解析讲解，也有AI讲解，总有一种讲法适合你。

二、 课内学习全闭环：预习+同步练，让孩子主动学、高效练
#家长痛点一次性解决
预习没效果**孩子随便翻书应付，上课听不懂。
练习不对标**买的练习题和学校教的不一致，白费时间。
计算练不动**催孩子练口算就闹脾气，亲子关系紧张。
#小猿AI一站式解决
AI课内预习**智能拆解教材重难点，通过引导式讲解+互动问答提前化解理解障碍，AI带你一步步走进课本。

更多校内练习**课文点读、竖式计算、单位换算、听算练习、字词听写、语文作文、必备古诗、试卷下载、课文背诵、背单词、单词听写、口语练习、拍照翻译、作文批改等。
口算PK**实时对战口算PK，勋章与班级排名激发竞争意识，让孩子爱上练口算。

三、情感价值赋能：让学习有温度，成长不孤单，孩子的24小时暖心伙伴

apps.title: Toddler Kids Learning Games
apps.description:
Smart Baby Sorter is an easy to understand and exciting app for early development of children from 2-3 years.
Compare and sort objects with one touch. Each child will be able to play regardless of his or her age.

The app includes 3 mini-games with different colorful combinations of the objects under study. The games are built on the principle "from the simple to the complex" and will keep your child occupied from the very first minutes.
The child will get acquainted with a variety of different concepts and objects and learn to distinguish them.

The games include such concepts and objects as:
- Simple shapes, colors and sizes
- Animals and birds
- Land, water, and space transport
- much more

The application allows your child to develop logic, as well as attention, fine motor skills and discipline successfully and independently.

apps.title: 悟空识字-儿童识字启蒙
apps.developer: Ningbo Qidian Education Technology Co., Ltd.
apps.description:
悟空识字是一款专注于汉字启蒙的产品，让儿童通过传统西游故事，对汉字进行有趣讲解和识字互动，实现汉字的听、说、认、识。配合汉字编写的西游小故事，适合自主阅读启蒙，是儿童了解汉字奥秘的好工具。

 
【产品特色】 
- 包含1200个汉字：覆盖常用汉字，采用形象认知思维帮助儿童理解。 
- 提供75篇原创阶梯阅读：通过西游剧情引导朗读和字词句的过渡。 
- 15大西游故事关卡：以西游记为背景，帮助儿童在听故事的同时认识汉字。 
- 《欢乐谷》、《汉字故事》等更多内容可直接体验。 

 
悟空识字的主要特点是完全站在儿童自己使用的角度，通过故事、动画、游戏等方式让孩子快乐使用。我们从不追求让儿童长时间使用，多年打磨产品的目的就是希望儿童每天只需要短短十几分钟的时间，一个月后能够开始自主阅读中文幼儿读物。健康、高效、有价值是我们追求的目标。
 
悟空识字采用一天一关的方式提供3到10个新汉字（可选，默认6个）给使用者，目的就是即保护儿童健康，又符合儿童记忆和认知特点，而且可以让儿童养成习惯，为未来打下坚实的基础。
 
我们希望悟空识字能为孩子们的汉字学习提供有益的帮助。

客服电话：400-666-3016（9:00-17:30）

apps.title: Archways to Careers
apps.description:
Are you a McDonald’s restaurant employee and want to know how you may be eligible for help with paying for college or getting a high school diploma? Or perhaps you are wondering how working for McDonald’s branded restaurant can get you on a career path. Archways to Careers helps you map your way to a future career. And along the way, you’ll explore the Archways to Opportunity programs that may help you get there. 

Set out on your personal career and education path through guided goals to learn about your work style and skills, identify careers of interest, and create an education plan. Eligible McDonald’s restaurant and participating franchise employees can also learn about Archways to Opportunity, a program that includes education benefits like tuition assistance, free Career Online High School, and career and educational advising. Archways to Opportunity has helped tens of thousands of McDonald’s restaurant employees obtain their high school diplomas, pay for college, and make progress in their career. Let’s add you to that list!

With Archways to Careers, you’re one step closer to a career you will love. 

Features:

Goals
Dive deeper into your career and education interests with guided resources to help you make progress toward your goals.

Meet with an advisor
Eligible McDonald’s restaurant employees can meet with an advisor to clarify goals, learn more about the Archways to Opportunity, and create a plan.

Discover Careers
Take a work style assessment and explore careers at McDonald’s, its participating franchisees, and in other featured industries that may align with your work style and skills. Save the careers that interest you.

Kai
Chat with your personal guide-bot, Kai, who can help answer your questions and connect you with an advisor. 

Notifications
Stay on top of your plan with helpful reminders and notifications.
__________

If you’re a McDonald’s restaurant employee interested in taking the next step in your career or education, Archways to Careers was designed for you! But even if you are not currently working for McDonald’s or a participating franchise, you can explore why McDonald’s is America’s Best First Job™.  
_______

Like many apps that connect to the internet, data transfer fees may be incurred. We recommend being data conscious while using these services.

apps.title: 混沌-学创新就在混沌
apps.developer: Hundun Times Beijing Education Technology Co., Ltd.
apps.description:
混沌学园成立于2014年，通过线上线下结合，以及独特的思维模型+刻意练习方法，用创新助力每一人，每一组织成就不凡。
价值百万的系统化商学课，李善友、王东岳、黄奇帆、郭广昌、俞敏洪等几百位企业家、思想者授课，听对一堂好课，足够让你超越80%的同行。
混沌在全国22个城市都有学习中心，每月组织各种主题线下学习活动。

【线上课程结构】
1. 创新学科：《第二曲线》、《第一性原理》、《理念世界》 李善友教授研发
2. 创新商学：增长、组织、战略、产品、领导力、财务6大模块
3. 个人成长：使命力、创造力、职场进阶、思考力、学习力
4. 哲科思维：科学素养、哲学素养、东岳学习坊、许倬云系列
5. 产经趋势：科技趋势、社会趋势、政经趋势、宏观趋势
6. 行业案例：消费、实体零售、餐饮、房地产、教育、文娱、制造业、科技、企业服务、互联网、交通物流、金融，数百个案例，CEO亲授

【系统学，系统练】
1. 共学场：每周六新课上线，万人线上共学，一同听课，一起讨论
2. 共学日：领教串讲知识框架，帮同学答疑解惑
3. 答辩月：完成模块学习，参与答辩，获得学习证书

【学园产品体系】
在线学籍：商业创新必修课

apps.title: Otsimo | Special Education 1+
apps.description:
Featured for over 300 days! 


Otsimo is a certified and award-winning educational game application developed for individuals diagnosed with learning disorders, attention deficit disorders, autism, Down syndrome, Aspergers, and other special needs. Otsimo Special Education has been awarded Mom's Choice Awards, Parent's Pick Awards, Education Alliance Finland, the Academics’ Choice Mind-Building Media and Toys Award, and was selected for the HundredED Global Collection of 2020, 2021, and 2022. It has been chosen as the BEST autism app by many autism publications.


Parents LOVE Otsimo Special Education!


Created under the guidance of parents, psychologists, and special education teachers; assistive games in Otsimo teach fundamental education and concepts that develop cognitive, communication, and motor skills with well-researched methods. Here are just some of the categories found in the app:
Social stories,
Numbers and letters, 
Vocabulary and words,
Emotions and feelings,
Colors,
Music and singing,
Animals and environment,
Vehicles and SO MUCH MORE!


With the help of visual and auditory cues, Otsimo Special Education helps users improve their motor and cognitive skills by helping them match, draw, choose, and put items in order.


Why should you try Otsimo Special Education at home?
Learning path: The perfect feature to provide the most personalized experience. It provides a specific curriculum to the individuals’ special education and learning therapy needs. Depending on the individuals’ learning and playing progress, the Learning Path adjusts the difficulty and special education content.
Customizability: All of the learning game and difficulty settings are completely customizable for you to adjust.
No ads, ever: Otsimo Special Education follows a strict no-ads policy, preventing any kind of intrusion and unwanted disturbance.
Detailed progress reports: Access detailed reports that give insight into the performance and progress. The games individuals have played, special education progress, and the skills they have been working on will all be in this report!


It can be used by individuals that have developmental or learning disorders such as Autism spectrum disorder, Down syndrome, Asperger’s, ADHD, cerebral palsy, amyotrophic lateral sclerosis, motor neuron disease (MND), speech impediments, and aphasia.


Otsimo Premium
Otsimo offers a variety of games for free but you can always upgrade to premium to access more educational games and features!
Otsimo Premium offers:
Access to all 100+ educational games
Regular content update
A personalized curriculum
Daily and weekly report cards on tha games played and to track the progress
Cross-platform support
Multiple user feature
Social storybooks with visual and auditory cues
Play offline anytime anywhere


For Otsimo Premium, we offer the following subscriptions:
1 month from $20.99
1 year from $13.75/monthly
Lifetime from $229.99


If you upgrade to Otsimo Premium, payment will be charged to your App Store account at the confirmation of purchase. Subscriptions automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off or subscription is cancelled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours of the end of the current period, and the cost of the renewal will be provided.


Subscriptions can only be managed by the user. Auto-renewal can be turned off by going to the user’s Subscription Settings after purchase. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication.


For more information:
Privacy Policy & Terms of Use - https://otsimo.com/legal/privacy-en.html
Payment Policy - https://otsimo.com/legal/payment.html

apps.title: Zen Educate
apps.description:
We're building a fairer and more ethical alternative to traditional recruitment agencies, taking out the hassle — no more paperwork — and the waste — leaving more for the teachers and the pupils.

Use our app to...

For teachers, teaching assistants and special education paraprofessionals:
- manage your teaching profile for how you show up to schools
- manage your calendar to set when you want to work and when you don't
- accept or decline offers for work from schools
- see your past work

For schools:
- search for fully-screened and interviewed teachers, teaching assistants or special education paraprofessionals and request them for work
- save your preferred teachers, check their availability and rebook them for future work
- manage and confirm timesheets

What people are saying about Zen Educate:

"Really have enjoyed working with and for Zen Educate—they are helpful every step of the way" — Claire, Teaching Assistant

"A great company who pride themselves on their honesty and ability to deliver good teachers to schools. Staff are paid more and schools pay less compared to competitors." — Colin, Teacher and former Principal

"Zen Educate is a much-needed simplification of the substitute industry. Simple but rigorous onboarding, combined with efficient job placement, excellent and punctual pay and responsive support make Zen the go-to for schools and staff. Highly impressed!" — Sean, Teacher

“Zen Educate has provided us with a highly professional service, their platform is easy to navigate, and their phone app means that a last-minute booking is easy to make. They've saved us money, without sacrificing the quality of staff we expect." — Yvonne, Exec Director

“I now book my supply cover without picking up the phone! It's quicker, cheaper and more reliable than using an agency. I love it!"
— Ann, Principal


We're always rolling out improvements to our service and want you to be part of it. Please send us your feedback to help us improve.

apps.title: PTE Alpaca-Practice for Exam
apps.description:
羊驼PTE已专注PTE语言培训多年，将智能AI技术与品质教研团队结合，为用户提供AI智能水平测试以及专业备考练习材料，已有超过35个国家的考生在使用。



1.用心服务考生
羊驼PTE2016年即研究出PTE考试20个题型的交叉评分机制，并且免费公布让所有考生学习。同时也是官方授权的PTE考试券重要分销商，通过羊驼报名即可享考试报名费用优惠。



2.AI智能测评与教研的深度结合
通过羊驼AI智能测评，分析备考弱项，提供有针对性的课程教学与题目练习，研发口听提分多项功能，如RA五步拆解、精听跟读等。

3.专业的师资教研团队
专注PTE领域，打造出针对PTE考试的特色教学体系。



4.考试机经
实时收录PTE考生考场回忆，每周一发布本周高频预测练习题，根据大数据频率筛选出近期预测考题。



5.羊驼社区，交流分享考试点点滴滴
羊驼APP已有数万条考生互助分享帖，社区定期发布高分学员备考经验，特定题型备考干货。你可以在这里进行经验分享、交流互动。

raw_data.releaseNotes:
1、首页结构调整：调整本周高频展示位置；增加学习数据展示、学习工具管理、学习课程展示
2、全题型练习列表：增加更多标签展示
3、高频列表：增加变形题、每日预测、多次考过、图片类型、场景分类等标签展示；预测大数据支持收起；调整本周新增和每日预测展示方式
4、学习数据页面更新：增加错题数据统计以及今日错题列表
5、增加用户反馈入口

apps.title: 学而思-中小学生学习教育平台
apps.developer: Beijing Xintang Sichuang Education Technology Co., Ltd.
apps.description:
学而思手机端官方学习软件。覆盖编程、创新思维、人文美育、科学实验和围棋等多种素养课程，是一款有趣又专业、适合3-16岁儿童和青少年的素养学习软件。帮助孩子激发兴趣、开拓思维、培养能力。

学而思成立于2003年，是好未来旗下综合性教育品牌。我们率先提出小班教学模式，给予孩子全方位的关注。19年来，我们收获了广大家长孩子们的认可和信赖。成立以来，我们始终进行着对素质教育的探索和实践。2009年，摩比思维独创“溯源教学法”，致力于培养爱思考、会表达的孩子。2019年，学而思培优推出少儿益智系列课程，将“素养”和“能力”培养融入知识体系，助力提升孩子的探究能力和思辨性思维。

2021年9月，学而思推出全新的素养课程，专注于3-16 岁儿童和青少年的创新素养教育。依托学而思多年的教研沉淀，结合《学习罗盘》的《21 世纪核心素养5C 模型》等总体框架，秉承“激发兴趣、开拓思维、培养能力”的教育理念，学而思素养自主研发了编程、创新思维、人文美育、科学实验和围棋等多款素养产品，通过构建小组式、体验式、项目式、主题式的创新课堂，培养孩子们面向未来的能力，激发孩子成长的内在潜能，助力养成有创新意识、创新思维、创新能力和会创新实践的孩子，致力于帮助孩子实现个体发展、适应未来的竞争力。

学而思，就在这里等你来！

客服电话：10108899
咨询时间：8:00-21:00

apps.title: iHuman Pinyin
apps.description:
iHuman Pinyin is a rewarding edutainment experience for young children built around the principle of ‘listen and say’. Content includes 63 Pinyin elements, 401 Pinyin combinations, and 88 songs. Children play through fun, interactive, and age-appropriate activities that help develop various Pinyin skills, including reading, pronunciation, writing, spelling, and memorization.

Product Features
1.Live-Action and Animated Content 
We feature live-action and animated activities that are separated into nine unique stages, including Play, Pronounce, Read, Say, and Spell, that give Children multiple ways to engage with Pinyin. 

2.Instant Pronunciation Feedback
Our self-developed voice evaluation technology helps children effectively learn correct pronunciation. Through a variety of fun situations, children can receive instant pronunciation feedback.

3.Original Children’s Songs
Each Pinyin element has a unique, catchy song produced exclusively for iHuman Pinyin users.

4.Illustrated Leveled Readers
Read twenty-eight carefully written and beautifully illustrated Pinyin leveled readers. Each story is designed to complement and support the Pinyin stages throughout the app.

5.Interactive and Fun Scenarios
Explore a world of more than one hundred carefully designed, interactive scenarios covering: animals, forests, oceans, daily life, food, sports, health, science, and technology.

CONTACT US Email：service@ihuman.com

We offer 2 subscription methods:
ANNUAL VIP：$31.99 valid for 1 year
3-MONTH VIP：$22.99 valid for 3 month

1.All purchases will be processed and confirmed through your iTunes account.
2.Membership will be automatically renewed
unless you turn off the renewal at least 24 hours prior to the end of the current subscription period.
3.Subscription fee for the next month will be charged within 24 hours before the end of the current subscription period.
4.You can manage subscriptions and turn off
automatic renewal in your iTunes account settings
5.Membership will remain active until the end of the current subscription period.
6.Privacy policy:https://www.ihuman.com/new_privacy.html?appid=8&lang=en
7.Terms of service:https://www.ihuman.com/new_terms.html?appid=8&lang=en

apps.title: Seesaw
apps.description:
Beloved by teachers around the world, Seesaw is the only educational platform built specifically to address the unique needs of elementary classrooms. Seesaw brings together high-quality instruction, authentic assessments that drive deep learning insights, and inclusive communication – in one place. With Seesaw, students have the power to show their thinking and share their learning, ideas and creativity with their teachers and families. 

Used by 10M teachers, students and families in over a third of elementary schools in the US. Beyond the US, Seesaw is used in over 130 countries!

Teachers love Seesaw—out of 1000 teachers surveyed, 92% said Seesaw makes their lives easier. 

Built on extensive educational research, Seesaw is validated by industry-leading third-party LearnPlatform as a designated evidence-based intervention, eligible for ESSA Federal Funding with Tier IV designation. 

Awarded the ISTE Seal of Alignment. Grounded in learning science research and based on practitioner experience, the ISTE Standards ensure that using technology for learning can create high-impact, sustainable, scalable and equitable learning experiences for all learners. 

High Quality Instruction
- Enable teachers to deliver high-quality, standards-aligned instruction that encourages student voice and choice
- Multimodal tools make learning accessible and engaging. Tools include video, voice, screen recording, photos, drawing, labeling and more!
- Present to Class mode designed for front of class modeling, whole class instruction and discussions 
- Assign activities to all students for center/stations work or whole class independent work. Use student groups to easily differentiate assignments 
- Over 1600 research-based and ready-to-teach lessons created by Seesaw’s curriculum experts with whole group instruction videos, 1:1 or small group practice activities and formative assessments. Includes robust lesson plans to support teacher implementation. 
- 100k ready-to-assign activities created by our community of educators and 1600+ ready-to-teach scaffolded lessons 

Inclusive Family Engagement 
- Engage families as partners in the learning process through inclusive two-way communication through portfolios and messages  
- Provide a window into the classroom and insight into their child's progress with frequent sharing of student posts and assignments 
- Robust messaging with built-in translation into over 100 home languages 
- Message Progress Reports to families to keep them informed 

Digital Portfolios 
- Capture learning completed within and outside of Seesaw through digital portfolios that showcase student growth.
- Organize student work by folder and skill 
- Simplify parent-teacher conferences and report cards 

Assessment to Support Data-Driven Decisions  
- Routinely assess student learning to glean meaningful insights into their understanding and make data-informed instructional decisions 
- Formative assessments with auto-graded questions provided detailed and actionable reporting 
- Tie skills and standards to activities for easy progress monitoring of key learning objectives 

Accessible and Differentiated Learning 
- Enable developmentally appropriate, accessible, and differentiated instruction to reach and engage all learners  

Seesaw is COPPA, FERPA and GDPR compliant. Learn more at web.seesaw.me/privacy

Need help? Visit our Help Center at help.seesaw.me.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
- Accessibility updates
- Minor UI updates
- Minor bug fixes and feature enhancements.

apps.title: Educational Games for Kids 2-4
apps.description:
Play games with dinosaurs, read fairy tales, and learn with Pengui!
"Amaya Kids World" is an amusement park that will acquaint your children with the amazing World of Dinosaurs, fun and interesting educational games, and even fairy tale stories with friendly characters!

Application features:
• Mix learning and fun
• Enjoy the colorful graphics and animations
• Take pleasure in the entertaining sounds
• Play games and read books offline
• No ads – Safe and kid-friendly

- CARS
Choose any vehicle, upgrade it, and go on a trip!

- BOATS
Choose a boat, decorate it, and sail away to explore new places!

- SHAPES
Learn to sort shapes by size and color! Children develop logic and fine motor skills!

- SORTING
Sort items into different categories – balls, planes, and cars all have their place!

- DINOSAURS
Play and make friends with all the dinosaurs, and learn fun facts about these astonishing creatures.

- FAIRY TALES
Experience the magic of fully narrated fairy tales with interactive scenes and animated characters! Read books and play educational games!

- MATH GAMES
Learn numbers, shapes, and counting – math has never been so easy and enjoyable!

- FARM
Meet the lovable residents of the farm – a pink pig, a cuddly goat, and a friendly puppy!

- LULLABIES
Baby can drift off to sleep with a soothing lullaby – for the perfect night's rest!

- COLORING
Color the picture, get creative, and develop your imagination and fine motor skills!

With a fantastic selection of games, colorful animation, and intuitive interface, this app will appeal to boys, girls – and even their parents!

Your little one will spend time usefully! Kids will develop memory, logic, and attention by playing fun educational games.

Switch between different languages and start learning new words!

Terms of use: http://amayakids.com/terms.html

We love to make kids happy with entertaining games, and we also like to read your emails! If you need help, have questions, or want to say 'hi', please get in touch at info@amayasoft.com

raw_data.releaseNotes: We've fixed bugs and improved performance, ensuring a fun, seamless experience for your little ones. Don't forget to leave us feedback so we can keep improving!

apps.title: ParentSquare
apps.description:
What is ParentSquare?

ParentSquare helps schools and families stay connected and informed—all in one easy place. Whether it’s a quick message from a teacher, an important alert from the district, or a reminder about tomorrow’s field trip, ParentSquare makes sure families never miss a thing.

Why families and teachers love ParentSquare:

• Simple, easy-to-use app and website
• Messages are automatically translated into 190+ languages
• Best-in-class safety and security practices
• One place for all school updates, alerts, and messages

With ParentSquare, families and staff save time and stay connected—so everyone can focus on helping students succeed.

ParentSquare for iOS

The ParentSquare app makes it easy for families to stay in the loop and engage with their child’s school community. With the app, parents and guardians can:

• See school news, classroom updates, and photos
• Receive important notices like attendance alerts and cafeteria balances
• Message teachers and staff directly
• Join group conversations
• Sign up for wishlist items, volunteering, and conferences
• Respond to absences or tardies*
• Pay school-related fees and invoices*


* If included with your school's implementation

raw_data.releaseNotes: Bug fixes & performance improvements.

apps.title: Learning Genie for Educators
apps.description:
Learning Genie provides innovative mobile and web applications for early childhood educators to create evidence-based learning progress portfolios and engage families in children’s learning. Use data from authentic assessments to plan individualized lesson plans.

Key features of Learning Genie Educator app:

1. Use portfolio tags to track and organize children’s developmental observations and assessment evidence. While Learning Genie includes a variety of Early Learning Standards across 50 states in the U.S. and around the world, we can also provide customization for your school’s assessment framework. The portfolio dashboard also helps educators track their progress toward completing assessments.

2. Share videobooks, photos, learning media videos, event reminders, and more with parents in real time through the app. 

a) Book and learning media features provide opportunities for parents to reinforce their children’s learning at home through songs, videobooks, parenting tips, etc..

b) Teachers or administrators can send reports to individuals or any group of children.

c) The reminder feature will auto-sync to families’ mobile calendar to remind them about important events.

3. Administrators and teachers can manage classrooms, import children and parents with ease, and download portfolio reports in PDF form.

4. School admins and teachers can manage classrooms, import children and parents with ease and download portfolio reports in PDF form.

apps.title: كتابي
apps.developer: Regional Center for Development of Educational Software(REDSOFT)
apps.description:
التطبيق الذي حصل على المركز الأول من بين التطبيقات المجانية في الآب ستور لدولة الكويت بعد يوم واحد فقط من إطلاقه!!

يأتي تطوير تطبيق الكتاب الإلكتروني "كتابي" لصفوف التعليم العام بوزارة التربية في دولة الكويت والذي يحوي كافة الكتب الدراسية لصفوف المراحل الدراسية الثلاث (الابتدائية – المتوسطة – الثانوية) كبادرة جديدة ضمن سعي المركز الإقليمي لتطوير البرمجيات التعليمية للاستفادة من تقنيات الاتصالات والمعلومات في تطوير المنظومة التعليمية وخدمة التعليم.
ويسمح "كتابي" بتحديد الصفوف الدراسية التي يرغب استعراضها المستخدم، ومن ثم تحميل الكتب المختارة فقط، مع مزايا التصفح والتحديد وكتابة الملاحظات والبحث والتنقل بين الكتب والصفحات وغيرها من المزايا العديدة لتصاحب الطالب في البيت والمدرسة، ولتمثل 
بديلا سهل الاستخدام للكتب المطبوعة يمكن للطالب تصفحها في أي مكان وزمان.

***********
المميزات :
***********
* تحميل جميع كتب وزارة التربية من الصف الأول الإبتدائي إلى الصف الثاني عشر الثانوي مجاناً
* تحديد النص في الكتاب
* إضافة ملاحظات على صفحات معينة من الكتاب
* إضافة الإشارات المرجعية
* الكتابة والرسم على صفحات الكتاب مع إمكانية التظليل على النص
* تغيير نوع الخط ولونه عند الكتابة على صفحات الكتاب
* تكبير وتصغير الخط
* إمكانية طباعة الكتب كاملة أو صفحات معينة من الكتاب
* والكثير من المميزات الأخرى 

”My eBooks” is an eBook library that contains all books, for all grades, of the Ministry of Education at the State of Kuwait.  It was developed by the Regional Center for Development of Educational Software with many advantages and features that allows the student to study on the iPhone and iPad just like they do with a regular textbook. Features include highlighting, writing notes, bookmarks, printing, searching, and many others. The application was designed to accompany the student at home, school, and to be a good substitute that is easy to use for printed books. Students can browse them on their iPhones or iPads anywhere and anytime they want.

***********
Features :
***********
* Download all Ministry of Education books from Grade 1 to Grade 12 for FREE!!
* Bookmark pages.
* Annotations: Highlight, Underline, Draw a line, Draw squares, Draw circles, Add Photo, Add Stamp, etc..
* Notes.
* Search.
* Define words.
* Wikipedia.
* Zoom In/Zoom Out.
* Printing: print books with annotations, print books without annotations.
* Add text, change text color, change font, etc..
* And much more!

***********
Contact Us
 تواصل معنا 
***********
Twitter/Instagram: @redsoftkw
Website: www.redsoft.org
Email: Info@redsoft.org

يأتي تطوير تطبيق الكتاب الإلكتروني "كتابي" لصفوف التعليم العام بوزارة التربية في دولة الكويت والذي يحوي كافة الكتب الدراسية لصفوف المراحل الدراسية الثلاث (الابتدائية – المتوسطة – الثانوية) كبادرة جديدة ضمن سعي المركز الإقليمي لتطوير البرمجيات التعليمية للاستفادة من تقنيات الاتصالات والمعلومات في تطوير المنظومة التعليمية وخدمة التعليم.
ويسمح "كتابي" بتحديد الصفوف الدراسية التي يرغب استعراضها المستخدم، ومن ثم تحميل الكتب المختارة فقط، مع مزايا التصفح والتحديد وكتابة الملاحظات والبحث والتنقل بين الكتب والصفحات وغيرها من المزايا العديدة لتصاحب الطالب في البيت والمدرسة، ولتمثل 
بديلا سهل الاستخدام للكتب المطبوعة يمكن للطالب تصفحها في أي مكان وزمان.

***********
المميزات :
***********
* تحميل جميع كتب وزارة التربية من الصف الأول الإبتدائي إلى الصف الثاني عشر الثانوي مجاناً
* تحديد النص في الكتاب
* إضافة ملاحظات على صفحات معينة من الكتاب
* إضافة الإشارات المرجعية
* الكتابة والرسم على صفحات الكتاب مع إمكانية التظليل على النص
* تغيير نوع الخط ولونه عند الكتابة على صفحات الكتاب
* تكبير وتصغير الخط
* إمكانية طباعة الكتب كاملة أو صفحات معينة من الكتاب
* والكثير من المميزات الأخرى 

”My eBooks” is an eBook library that contains all books, for all grades, of the Ministry of Education at the State of Kuwait.  It was developed by the Regional Center for Development of Educational Software with many advantages and features that allows the student to study on the iPhone and iPad just like they do with a regular textbook. Features include highlighting, writing notes, bookmarks, printing, searching, and many others. The application was designed to accompany the student at home, school, and to be a good substitute that is easy to use for printed books. Students can browse them on their iPhones or iPads anywhere and anytime they want.

***********
Features :
***********
* Download all Ministry of Education books from Grade 1 to Grade 12 for FREE!!
* Bookmark pages.
* Annotations: Highlight, Underline, Draw a line, Draw squares, Draw circles, Add Photo, Add Stamp, etc..
* Notes.
* Search.
* Define words.
* Wikipedia.
* Zoom In/Zoom Out.
* Printing: print books with annotations, print books without annotations.
* Add text, change text color, change font, etc..
* And much more!

***********
Contact Us
 تواصل معنا 
***********
Twitter/Instagram: @redsoftkw
Website: www.redsoft.org
Email: Info@redsoft.org

apps.title: 数感星球-计算训练数感启蒙好帮手
apps.description:
【产品介绍】
数感星球是一款面向3-10岁孩子的数感计算训练APP，采用CPA教学法，打造16级的计算训练体系覆盖3-10岁用户的所有计算需求；将计算训练与趣味游戏相结合，阶梯式训练路径，将循序渐进的引导孩子主动解决问题，从而理解抽象的数学原理，无痛提升计算力。

【产品特色】
（1）AI智能精练系统，全面提升训练效率
• AI智能分析 定制个性化训练方案
• 智能题库推送  查漏补缺更精准
• 错题智能跟踪  强化薄弱环节

（2） 减轻家长督学压力，科学练习更轻松
• 基础-进阶-测评三步循环
• 数据化学习报告实时同步
• 系统化学习进度一目了然

（3） 游戏化趣味训练，激发学习主动性
• 寓教于乐，告别枯燥练习
• 趣味探索，保持学习兴趣
• 游戏闯关，培养学习动力。

（4）新加坡CPA教学理念，让数学更易懂
• 可视化互动学习体验
• 深度理解数学概念
• 动手实践，学以致用

（5）16级数感进阶体系，全方位算力提升
• 分级递进，因材施教
• 多维度练习，全面提升
• 紧贴教材，科学系统

apps.title: Answer.AI - Your AI tutor
apps.description:
Take your learning further with Answer.AI—the AI-powered study companion, academic guide, and personal tutor available 24/7 to support your educational journey. From step-by-step explanations to personalized study tools, collaborative learning spaces, and college prep resources, Answer.AI helps you build confidence and deepen your understanding across subjects.
Designed by educators, Answer.AI is trusted by a community of over 6 million learners who come together to expand their knowledge and develop critical thinking skills. Whether you're a student, teacher, or lifelong learner, our app supports your unique learning needs by providing guidance and resources to help you achieve your personal and academic goals.
Why Answer.AI? Learn anywhere. Built for mobile from day one, Answer.AI assists with school problem-solving anytime, anywhere.
Deeper thinking, not just answers—Answer.AI provides step-by-step breakdowns and insights to help you grasp even the most challenging concepts.
Support beyond academics—With features like financial aid guidance and counseling, Answer.AI helps students navigate both their studies and future planning with confidence.
Join 6 million+ learners—As an award-winning app founded by educators, Answer.AI is designed to enhance comprehension, boost confidence, and strengthen critical thinking skills.
【Answer.AI PRO PLAN】
 Functions: Unlimited usage, 2x faster query time, early access.
Billing & Payment: Payment will be charged to your iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase. All premium plans will be auto-renewed at the end of each period. Cancellation must be made at least 24 hours before the end of the valid period to avoid a nonrefundable auto-renewal.
You can manage and turn off auto-renewal in your Apple Account Settings. Initiation or termination of a premium plan must be done through the iTunes App Store, which may be subject to sales tax in your area. Note: you are responsible for checking the Terms of Service of your app store for detail and applicability of sales tax. Refunds are not available after purchase.
In-App Purchases: Refill packs provided.
Terms of Service: https://answerai.pro/terms-of-service.html
Privacy Policy: https://answerai.pro/privacy-policy.html
You'll be able to chat with AskAI, find a study group, and more as soon as you sign up. If you want to continue using some of our Premium features, you can subscribe to Answer.AI's paid plans and enjoy an ad-free experience with features like voice chat, AP study plans, scholarship advising, and faster, higher-quality solutions.

apps.title: Spark Education Student
apps.description:
Spark Education: Achieve academic success the fun and efficient way. Award-winning interactive classes taught in real time by certified teachers in small groups for students ages 5-12. 

Join the Spark Family with over 650,000 satisfied students in 100+ countries and regions and see why our students love our classes.

Our accredited pedagogy experts redefine Math and Chinese education to meet the modern needs of young learners, focusing on nurturing curiosity, building confidence, and overcoming academic challenges.

Developed by tech experts and designers, our interactive courseware empowers students to visualize complex concepts, get real-time feedback, and achieve key learning milestones in a fun, effective, and efficient way.

Join Spark Education and experience the future of learning today!

Small Group Classes
More individualized attention and peer support for your child.

Interactive Learning
Classes come alive with games and fun animations.

Motivating Rewards
Drive motivation with our smart reward system and Star Mall gifts.

User-friendly Design
Ensure a smooth learning experience through our intuitive design.

Live Teaching
Experienced teachers offer real-time guidance and feedback.

Progress Tracking
Personalized reports and lesson playback to track your child's progress.

apps.title: MOHELA
apps.description:
Manage your MOHELA student loans and schedule payments from your mobile phone!


MOHELA is dedicated to providing world-class customer service for the students whose loans we manage. As your knowledgeable and approachable go-to resource for account information and repayment options, we provide the tools to help you successfully repay your student loans. MOHELA is here to assist!


Headquartered in St. Louis, Missouri, our primary focus is student loan servicing. This app provides MOHELA’s CASHLoans and FFELP loan borrowers with quick and secure account access, payment scheduling/history, form upload capability, tax information, and messaging capabilities.
