apps.title: Lingokids - Play and Learn
apps.description:
THE #1 INTERACTIVE APP FOR KIDS

Lingokids is the fun, safe, educational kids learning game that toddlers and children aged 2–8 love — and parents trust! Packed with over 3000 shows, songs, coloring games, cooking games, and interactive activities, it lets your child play, learn, and grow at their own pace. This is screen time for girls and boys you can feel good about.

5 Reasons Lingokids is guilt-free for families

Made by parents & educators
Loved by toddlers, preschoolers, and elementary school kids
kidSAFE® certified & 100% ad-free
More than 30 global awards
Over 3000 fun kids games and activities to play!

INTERACTIVE ACTIVITIES
Explore over 3000 interactive games, coloring games, and toddler-friendly challenges covering 650+ learning objectives — all through play! Subjects include math, literacy, science, engineering, art, music, and more. Kids can move at their own pace through a curated curriculum using fun toddler games, books, videos, and songs. Perfect games for 2,3,4,5,6,7,8 year olds!

MODERN LIFE SKILLS
Play and learn with activities that build both academic and real-world strengths. From emotional regulation to robotics, empathy to coding — Lingokids helps toddlers and children aged 2–8 prepare for modern life. Created for boys and girls, the app encourages creativity, mindfulness, collaboration, and resilience — all through play.

PLAYLEARNING™ METHOD
At Lingokids, we believe learning sticks when it’s wrapped in fun. Our Playlearning™ method inspires toddlers and kids to discover the world naturally — through play, repetition, and curiosity. From coloring and games to movement, stories, and songs, every interaction builds real skills.

FEATURED BRANDS & CHARACTERS
Your kids can now play with familiar favorites like Blippi and Pocoyo, all available inside the app. Plus, discover activities created with trusted names like NASA and Oxford University Press.

Many families may already know Lingokids from our videos on YouTube and YouTube Kids, where over 3 million subscribers enjoy our playful, educational content. Now, those same kids can keep learning through fun toddler games and interactive activities inside the app.

SUBJECTS, THEMES & LEVELS THAT GROW WITH YOUR CHILD
Reading & Literacy: Build phonics, writing, and reading confidence.

Math & Engineering: Strengthen number sense, addition, subtraction, and logical thinking.

Science & Tech: Introduce biology, chemistry, coding, robotics and NASA-powered activities.

Music & Art: Play with rhythm, sound, and creativity in music + coloring games.

Social-Emotional Learning: Practice empathy, expression, and mindfulness.

History & Geography: Spark curiosity about the world and its stories.

Physical Activity: Fun stretches, yoga, and movement songs keep toddlers engaged!

TRACK PROGRESS & FAMILY FEATURES
Use the Parents Area to view progress for up to 4 children, get learning tips, browse topics, and celebrate every milestone. Built for the whole family, so you stay part of the journey.

WHY UPGRADE TO LINGOKIDS PLUS?
Unlimited access to 3000+ toddler games, coloring games, and activities

Covers 650+ learning goals across subjects and life skills

Expert-designed lessons for boys and girls aged 2–8

Blippi, Pocoyo, NASA and Oxford University Press content

Progress reports, parent community, and up to 4 child profiles

100% ad-free, with no in-app purchases

Play online or offline — anywhere, anytime!

Subscriptions automatically renew each month 24-hours before the end of the current period and your iTunes account will be charged unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. You can turn off auto-renew any time from within the app. Any unused portion of a free trial will be forfeited if you purchase a subscription.

Help & Support: https://help.lingokids.com/
Privacy Policy: https://lingokids.com/privacy
Terms of Service: https://www.lingokids.com/tos

raw_data.releaseNotes: It's a great week to play and learn! Explore new games, songs, and educational cartoons in the Lingokids app. Ignite curiosity and embark on adventures with the Lingokids friends. Happy Playlearning™!

apps.title: Teesas Education - Learn
apps.description:
Teesas Education is your all-in-one learning app, designed to help students excel in JAMB, WAEC, NECO, and all school subjects while also offering engaging video lessons for Grades 1–6 and JSS 1–SS3. Plus, explore Nigerian languages like Yoruba, Igbo, Hausa, and more with a gamified and easy-to-understand learning approach!

Welcome to Teesas Education App! Teesas provides high quality video tutorials from Africa’s best teachers that explain foundational concepts with delivery in English and major local languages to deepen understanding. 

Your child will also gain rapid knowledge and mastery of local languages (such as Ibo, Hausa, Yoruba and more) through our interactive personalised classes delivered by highly experienced native language tutors.
Teesas Education App is designed to provide a strong foundation for entrance exams into top Secondary schools with exam preparation content tailored for superior performance.
Our students will have access to live online video classes with tutors delivering in-depth explanation of core concepts. Our highly rated tutors are carefully selected through a rigourous process and are certified by National learning councils.
The videos are delivered in a mix of gamified and interactive animated tutorials to ensure high engagement and keep your child excited about learning foundational concepts.
Teesas Education App also provides access to E-books that supplement the video lessons. Students gain access to books that will strengthen their understanding and deepen their desire to learn.
The Teesas App has a parent app that also allows you track how your child is performing and opportunities for improvement. 

App Features:
High Quality Video Tutorials – Gain access to high quality videos presented by the best teachers with exciting content matched to curriculum for enhanced engagement 
Local Language Classes – Indigenously adapted videos aimed at enhancing knowledge of local languages delivered in an easy to understand format
Entrance Exam Preparation – Focused classes on entrance Exams for top schools to ensure your child gains entrance to choice secondary schools. Copious Exam practice tests for each video lesson  
Live Online Classes – Live classes where further explanation of concepts are delivered. Top tutors deploy a range of styles to make classes fun, exciting and deeply engaging 
Our believe is that education holds the key to transformational growth in Africa and understanding the difficult concepts at an early age will drive superior academic performance as the child progresses to higher classes. 

JAMB practice
JAMB past question 
WAEC past questions
NECO exam prep
UTME CBT
SSCE revision
Nigerian school curriculum
Video learning for kids
Primary school education
Secondary school subjects
Math, English, Science learning

Email: help@teesas.app

Terms and conditions: https://teesas.com/cpanel/term
Privacy policy: https://teesas.com/cpanel/privacy

Follow us on:
Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/teesasapp
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/teesasapp
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/teesasapp

raw_data.releaseNotes: We’re excited to roll out a new version of the Teesas application, packed with important bug fixes, functional enhancements, and overall improvements to ensure a smoother and more stable user experience. This update focuses on key areas that impact user engagement and reliability, based on feedback and issue tracking from the previous versions.
raw_data.description:
Teesas Education is your all-in-one learning app, designed to help students excel in JAMB, WAEC, NECO, and all school subjects while also offering engaging video lessons for Grades 1–6 and JSS 1–SS3. Plus, explore Nigerian languages like Yoruba, Igbo, Hausa, and more with a gamified and easy-to-understand learning approach!

Welcome to Teesas Education App! Teesas provides high quality video tutorials from Africa’s best teachers that explain foundational concepts with delivery in English and major local languages to deepen understanding. 

Your child will also gain rapid knowledge and mastery of local languages (such as Ibo, Hausa, Yoruba and more) through our interactive personalised classes delivered by highly experienced native language tutors.
Teesas Education App is designed to provide a strong foundation for entrance exams into top Secondary schools with exam preparation content tailored for superior performance.
Our students will have access to live online video classes with tutors delivering in-depth explanation of core concepts. Our highly rated tutors are carefully selected through a rigourous process and are certified by National learning councils.
The videos are delivered in a mix of gamified and interactive animated tutorials to ensure high engagement and keep your child excited about learning foundational concepts.
Teesas Education App also provides access to E-books that supplement the video lessons. Students gain access to books that will strengthen their understanding and deepen their desire to learn.
The Teesas App has a parent app that also allows you track how your child is performing and opportunities for improvement. 

App Features:
High Quality Video Tutorials – Gain access to high quality videos presented by the best teachers with exciting content matched to curriculum for enhanced engagement 
Local Language Classes – Indigenously adapted videos aimed at enhancing knowledge of local languages delivered in an easy to understand format
Entrance Exam Preparation – Focused classes on entrance Exams for top schools to ensure your child gains entrance to choice secondary schools. Copious Exam practice tests for each video lesson  
Live Online Classes – Live classes where further explanation of concepts are delivered. Top tutors deploy a range of styles to make classes fun, exciting and deeply engaging 
Our believe is that education holds the key to transformational growth in Africa and understanding the difficult concepts at an early age will drive superior academic performance as the child progresses to higher classes. 

JAMB practice
JAMB past question 
WAEC past questions
NECO exam prep
UTME CBT
SSCE revision
Nigerian school curriculum
Video learning for kids
Primary school education
Secondary school subjects
Math, English, Science learning

Email: help@teesas.app

apps.title: LiveSchool for Educators
apps.description:
ATTN STUDENTS & PARENTS: 

This app is for school staff only. Download the LiveSchool Student and LiveSchool Parent apps to access your LiveSchool accounts.

***

ABOUT LIVESCHOOL

Bring out the best in your students—and your school — with LiveSchool.

Schools across the world use LiveSchool to reinforce good behavior with great rewards. Our real-time engagement tracking, digital points system, and community-building tools help your team create a school-wide feedback loop that drives positive culture. 

LiveSchool helps teams easily run school wide culture initiatives like PBIS, SEL, RTI, MTSS and more. Engage your students, enhance your culture!

***

LIVESCHOOL ON THE GO

The LiveSchool for Educators mobile app helps teachers and educators reward points to students on the go. Use it anywhere in your building, or in sync with your projector or whiteboard. 

- Give points to any student or groups of students as you move around the classroom or building.
- Motivate students with powerful synced notifications between your mobile device and your projector.
- Use simple classroom management tools like the Randomizer to save time and run an efficient classroom.
- Run your school rewards store from a mobile device.
- Review powerful student, teacher, or school data dashboards. Measure your school's culture initiatives, or provide helpful data in student and parent conferences.
- Run your school's House Points system. Pull up a real-time House Points dashboard on the go.

***

GO BEYOND BEHAVIOR TRACKING

Recognize, incentivize, and promote a positive school culture with points and rewards that inspire student participation.

apps.title: Toddler Games for 2+ Year Olds
apps.description:
KidloLand Toddler Town Games is a fun educational app for preschool kids with 1000+ interactive games to play and learn easily. Begin your child's early learning journey with these exciting educational games!

KidloLand Toddler Town Games includes puzzles, popping bubbles, coloring, dot to dot, dress up, match the pairs, sorting, tracing games, and more. These games will boost their cognitive skills, hand-eye coordination, concentration, and imagination. You will be amazed to see how quickly your child learns different things.

These games are a great way for you to have some fun learning time with your child. Watch your toddler complete these fun games while learning at the same time. It is filled with cute, colorful graphics and funny animations that encourage your child to learn more!

Features of KidloLand Toddler Town Games are:

- Ideal For Preschool Kids
These games are ideal for kids in the preschool level (1-5 years). Kids will learn animals, numbers, shapes, colors and much more!

- Kid Friendly
All the games in this app are completely kid-friendly. Toddlers can play them easily.

- Different Categories
Choose from a wide range of game categories like Farm, Animals, Fun, Insects, Space, City, Marine, Vehicles and Birds.

- Available Offline & No Ads
These games can be played anytime and anywhere without internet. Completely ad-free.

- Cute Characters & Animations
Delight your kids with our cute and colorful characters and funny interactive animations.

The 'Free Games' section is completely free to play. The other categories can be unlocked via subscription.

Subscription Details:
- Subscribe to get access to full content including future updates: US $7.99/month or US $49.99/year.
- Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase.
- Cancel subscription renewal anytime under Manage App Subscriptions in your iTunes Settings.
- Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renewal is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period.
- The renewal cost will be same: US $7.99/month or US $49.99/year.
- Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period.
- Use the subscription in any iPad/iPhone/iPod registered with your Apple account.
- No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during active subscription period.

Privacy Policy: http://www.kidlo.com/privacypolicy.php
Terms of service: http://www.kidlo.com/terms_of_service.php
If you need help or have any feedback, email us at support@kidlo.com

Make your child's learning journey fun with KidloLand Toddler Town Games. Download now!

apps.title: 学而思网校-专注素质教育的在线学习平台
apps.developer: Beijing Xueersi Education Technology Co., Ltd.
apps.description:
学而思教育，以培养阅读、逻辑、动手、合作和表达五大能力为核心，激发孩子成长的内在潜能，养成人文底蕴、科学精神、学会学习和实践创新等核心素养。
学而思网校，以“培养能力，让每个孩子拥有更美好的人生”为目标，帮助每个孩子“树立改变世界的远大理想、将兴趣发展成为在未来社会立足的核心能力，追求更美好的人生”。
产品设计以“人文”和“科学”作为核心素质基础，构建多元能力模型，启发兴趣探索，培养孩子通过现象看本质的能力、综合实践能力和跨学科理解力。
【产品特色】
人文创作：引入“思辨读书”理论，专注孩子学习力、思考力，以及沟通力的培养，帮助孩子认知更大的世界。
科学思维：以“探究”的方法启发思考，让孩子动手感知科学知识、规律和原理，培养“认知力”、“思考力”和“探究力”。
编程思维：培养“运用思维”的方法，通过计算思维、逻辑思维、创新思维的提升，更好的将所学知识应用到解决实际问题。
【在线专属功能】
因材施教：根据孩子特点定制专属成长方案，更有针对性
直播讲解：面对面互动沟通，随时随地在线学习；
家长旁听：家长可在线旁听，实时了解孩子成长情况；
【科技助力成长】
提升报告：学习后生成多维度综合素养提升报告，全面分析孩子成长动态；
互动探索：辩论会、战队PK，孩子参与感强、体验氛围活跃；
智能识别：AI手势表情识别技术，实时识别孩子专注度；
智能语音：AI语音学习系统，互动式对话和智能评测让孩子多说多练

apps.title: Paper Education: K-12 Tutoring
apps.description:
Check with your school to find out if you have an account! If you have Paper™, you have free access to an Educational Support System built for the 21st century. On the mobile app, students can access 24/7 live tutoring in any subject—plus writing feedback—right at your fingertips! 

Log in with help from your school

If you do have a Paper account, ask your teacher, principal, or another school official how to log in. You may have to enter an email address and password or use a single sign-on service, such as Google, Clever, or ClassLink.

Live Help

Paper’s Live Help provides unlimited, 24/7, and on-demand access to high-quality academic support. You’ll get connected to real human tutors to help you achieve your personal goals for schoolwork and beyond.

Ask any question, anytime across all subject areas by typing out your thoughts or taking a picture of your homework. There are no time limits on tutoring sessions, and you can log on as often as you want!

Review Center

Paper’s Review Center helps you get feedback on any kind of writing project or assignment, from book reports and bibliographies to lab reports, creative writing, college application essays, résumés, and more.

With the Paper app, you can submit written work to the Review Center on the go. Then, you can check the status of your projects and view feedback after your tutor has taken a look.

Multilingual tutoring support

Get connected with tutors who speak English, Spanish, French, or Mandarin to work through questions in any subject.

Celebrating progress: A fun way to learn

As you work with tutors on the Paper app, you’ll complete challenges, gain points, and earn badges and trophies. 



Visit app.paper.co from any device for unlimited access to even more fun features—from your favorite after-school educational shows on PaperLive to interactive math practice and a fun Daily Challenge on Paper Math.

Remember: Before downloading the app, check with your school to make sure you have access to Paper!

raw_data.releaseNotes:
Introducing our biggest update yet!

- Math Snap: We’re excited to unveil Math Snap, a feature designed to empower students throughout their math problem-solving journey. Math Snap provides comprehensive step-by-step guidance, offering simple explanations to help you tackle even the most challenging equations. If ever you’re still stuck, our tutors are always available to support you.

- The mobile app now brings Paper Missions and Paper Reading to your fingertips. Build your streak by completing math challenges, and collect reading coins with every Paper Reading session!

apps.title: BigFuture School
apps.description:
BigFuture® School is a free mobile app for students 13 and over who take the digital PSAT/NMSQT, PSAT 10, or SAT School Day in the United States and provided their mobile phone number. To access the app, you'll need to use the mobile number you provided when you took your test. This account information is separate from your College Board account. 

With this app, you can:

• Get your test scores easily on your phone
• Connect with nonprofit colleges and scholarship programs through Connections™ ** that may be a good match for you
• Get customized career information
• Learn about how to plan and pay for college

Learn more about BigFuture School and how to access it here:
https://satsuite.collegeboard.org/bigfuture-school-mobile-app

**If Connections is offered at your school

raw_data.releaseNotes: The new version of the app is now available for students who take the PSAT 8/9, PSAT/NMSQT, and SAT in the fall of 2025. Students will be able to access their scores on the app a few weeks after they take the test. The app also has updated terms and conditions, opt-in features, bug fixes, and improved performance.

apps.title: MyU - Interactive Learning
apps.description:
MyU is an award-winning interactive learning management system (LMS) that organizes learning and communication in any school or classroom. The platform creates a safe and controlled environment for educators to manage classes, engage with learners, organize content, and create discussions inside and outside the classroom. 

Educators using MyU report a 55% higher student engagement, a 63% richer teaching experience, and a 61% higher productivity over legacy LMS platforms (According to a 2019 survey with 900 educator respondents)

Simple steps to registering on MyU:

Download the app from the store
Create an account (Instructor, Student, Management or Parent) 
If you couldn’t find your school during registration, you can manually add it from the app

Instructors and schools use MyU to:

Organize all classes in one place
Post learning material in different formats (PDF, Word, Excel, links and PPT)
Send announcements, reminders, and create discussions in different formats (photos, videos, voice notes)
Manage daily class attendance, and generate reports
Manage grading, and generate reports
Post graded and ungraded questions to receive private responses and provide feedback
Check post analytics and find out who viewed your post and who missed it
Chat with students privately in one-on-one conversations or in groups
Find other instructors teaching the same topic and share knowledge
Set privacy and visibility preferences for profile and posts

MyU offers a standard free tier providing 100MB of document space, 8 classes, 3-minute videos, 4-images on each post, and 90-day private messaging storage.

An upgrade to MyU Prime is available for instructors where they will be provided with an additional 100GB of document upload space, 12 extra classes, uploading up-to 8 images on each post, sharing up-to 30-minute long video and voice notes, and unlimited storage of all private messages.

Users can subscribed for a 1 week free trial, after which they will be auto-billed monthly. After any subscription has been stopped, users will have the option to renew their subscription on a monthly, or annual basis. Subscriptions are auto-renewed before expiry. Users can turn off auto-renewal at least 24 hours prior to the end of the billing period.

Link to our MyU privacy policy: https://app.myu.co/privacypolicy

apps.title: Educators WI Mobile Banking
apps.description:
Educators Credit Union’s secure Mobile Banking application allows you to manage your account anytime, anywhere. Check your balances, make transfers, pay bills, view your credit score, deposit checks, and even create savings goals and budgets.

If you already use Online Banking, you are ready to log in — just use your Online Banking user ID and password. If you haven’t set up your user ID and password, just click the register button to get started.

FEATURES:

Account Management:
	•	Review and manage your account balances and transaction history for all your Educators accounts and loans
	•	Deposit a check with just two pictures
	•	­Buy, sell and hold Bitcoin powered by NYDIG
	•	Replace a damaged card
	•	Quickly add an account and apply for loans without taking a trip to a branch
	•	Customize your debit and credit cards
	•	Send secure messages directly to Educators Credit Union

Send and Receive Money:
	•	Pay and manage your monthly bills
	•	Transfer funds between your accounts at Educators and other financial institutions
	•	Send and receive money with your friends and family using Zelle®
	•	Schedule payments on your Educators loans
Financial Wellness:
	•	Check and monitor your credit score
	•	View your spending habits
	•	Set savings goals and budgets
	•	Evaluate your financial health using the Financial Wellness Assessment and Coach Lea

apps.title: EWA English Language Learning
apps.description:
Learn English, Spanish, or French with EWA! Read books with real time translations, discover unknown words with a tap of your finger, complete speaking courses with your favorite TV characters, and learn new words with flashcards - all for free in our app! Improve your existing skills today!

EWA is a personalized English, Spanish, or French tutor that fits in your pocket. Every user can decide for themselves how they would like to learn a language - at what level and at what pace:

1. More than 10,000 English, Spanish, or French books with audio are available for you to sharpen your reading, writing, and grammar skills. Choose a book that matches your current language level and start expanding your skills right away! Unknown word? Simply tap it to translate it, add it to your “to-learn” list, and memorize it forever!

2. Spoken video-courses with popular movie scenes and TV show characters is what our users love the most about EWA! It’s fun, interesting, and an innovative way to improve pronunciation and achieve language proficiency. The courses include a variety of topics, levels and time frames - so, regardless of your current skills, your language abilities will only benefit from EWA!

3. Oxford Topics Dialogues
Don't know what to say at passport control, how to ask for directions or order food at a café? Read and listen to dialogues on everyday topics, developed in collaboration with Oxford Reading University, that will help you in every journey of yours. Thanks to the dialogues, you'll be able to easily improve your conversational English by applying the material you've learned in real life!

4. All you need is a spare 5 minutes a day to learn English, Spanish, or French. More than 40,000 flashcards are available for you to choose from. Pick the words you want to learn and memorize them using the spaced repetition study method. Feeling excited about your progress? Compete on score charts, compare your results to thousands of other people, and get to the top-ranked spot!

5. The games section is now available in EWA.
A unique teaching methodology compromised of cognitive training exercises and easy-to-learn brain games will help you sharpen your language skills in a very fun and exciting way.
Our games aren’t time-wasters; they’re actually great mental stimulators!
Play, have fun, and most importantly, learn a new language in no time!

No more cramming, stress, and angry teachers! With EWA, you’ll learn the language whenever and wherever - at your own pace. You’ll improve your English, Spanish, or French and experience the beauty of knowing another language - from freedom while traveling to higher paying jobs.

Any feedback would be greatly appreciated! If you have any concerns, recommendations, or complaints just drop us a line at support@appewa.com and we’ll work towards making EWA better!

==================

PLEASE NOTE:

You will need an EWA subscription in order to access all courses and features. Courses available may vary depending your device’s language.

• Payment will be charged to your iTunes Account at ‘confirmation of purchase’
• Your account will be charged for a subscription renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period and will identify the cost of the renewal
• Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user’s Account Settings after purchase
• Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable

==================

Start now and experience a new way of learning English, Spanish, or French.
Expanding your vocabulary has never been easier.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
Check out our latest updates: we fixed a few bugs and, more importantly, added new learning content for you.
For more EWA news and product releases, follow us on social media. Tiktok - @appewa, Instagram - @ewa.english, Facebook - @EWA:Learn Languages

apps.title: Pony Education LIVE
apps.description:
Pony Education LIVE offers high quality multi-angle live and on-demand hairdresser education by distinguished educators of our industry’s elite. 

Our aim is to inspire and empower with wisdom and clear articulation of classic and modern cutting and styling techniques, from anywhere with an internet connection! Students will gain CONFIDENCE in our craft. Our thorough live demos and high quality full-length tutorials aim to bridge the gap between current skillset and mastery.

With Pony Education LIVE, you can expect:
-Live access to workshops where you can participate via chat as world class educators work on live models from our education center. You can now access world class education from your living room!
-At least two new on-demand full-length video tutorials per month, grouped by cut, educator, head shape, hair texture, and more.  Have confidence no matter the clientele.
-Access to our forum, which will house a community of engaged, inspired hairdressers and our educators! Come with a question and leave with a full exploration.

Pony Education teaches hairstylists how to look at the individual client and give something beautiful and interesting and suited to them and teaches the techniques to get there rather than teaching paint by number haircuts and putting them on heads.”
— JAYNE MATTHEWS, OWNER, EDO SALON

“It’s finally something that helps us! Not a cookie cutter technique of one thing! They are offering a variety of creative classes with a cool yet realistic twist!”
— JANIE NAFFZ, OWNER, ARGONAUTA (AUBURN, CA)

“Take the best educators who freelance because they truly love to teach, add to an intimate setting where you are free to ask as many questions as you like, see inspiration and demonstrations that open your creative eye and get your hands in the hair that day on carefully curated live models. What more do you need?”
— ADRIENNE, DEEDA SALON (SACRAMENTO)

“I would highly recommend Pony. I liked that it was somewhat intimate so asking questions was comfortable all around and the visual aspect was great at all angles. The instructor made sure we understood conceptually and visually. The class/course was well organized, so no lost time on the trivial stuff. I walked away wanting more!”
— MAXIE, RINGOLEVIO SALON & SPA (SF)

“If you are filling like you have holes in your skills or feeling stuck in same old thing. This is for you. Even if you think you can’t learn anything new you will.”
— MARK, MAVERIQUE STYLE HOUSE

“Great education offered for veterans in the business to inspire and rejouvinate creative minds!!”
— JODI NINOMIYA, DEKKO SALON

To access all features and content you can subscribe to Pony.Live Hair Education on a monthly or yearly basis with an auto-renewing subscription right inside the app.* Pricing can vary by region and will be confirmed before purchase in the app. In app subscriptions will automatically renew at the end of their cycle.

* All payments will be paid through your iTunes Account and may be managed under Account Settings after the initial payment. Subscription payments will automatically renew unless deactivated at least 24-hours before the end of the current cycle. Your account will be charged for renewal at least 24-hours prior to the end of the current cycle. Any unused portion of your free trial will be forfeited upon payment. Cancellations are incurred by disabling auto-renewal.

Terms of Service: https://www.ponyeducation.live/tos
Privacy Policy: https://www.ponyeducation.live/privacy

apps.title: Quran Explorer
apps.description:
Our Quran Explorer app is the perfect tool for anyone seeking a comprehensive and user-friendly way to explore the Quran. Available on iPhone, iPad, and Apple Watch, this essential app is completely ad-free in both the basic and premium versions.

Features include:

- Complete, scalable Quran with all diacritical marks
- Side-by-side English translation by Mufti Taqi Usmani with audio
- Beautiful Uthmanic and IndoPak script (fonts)
- Complete audio recitation by famous Qari Sheikh Mishari Rashid and more
- Bookmarking up to 3 and more
- Bulk download (for last ten suras only)
- Portrait and landscape mode
- Scalable font sizes
- Sura and Juz index
- High-quality audio recitation with ayah highlighting
- Pinch/zoom feature for changing the font size
- Fast audio playback through robust download method with progress icon
- Colored ayah marking to show downloaded audio
- Contextual toolbar on double tap
- Option to update existing content (for fixing errors in Quran text, translation or audio)
- Goto aya feature
- Our complete Arabic text and translation have been proofread by a Muslim scholar ('alim), ensuring accuracy and authenticity.

For those seeking even more features, our paid version (available for only USD $4.99) offers additional translations, reciters, English and Urdu translation audio, unlimited bookmarks, background audio, disable standby feature, bulk download, and much more. Explore the Quran like never before with our Quran Explorer app.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
We’re excited to bring you the latest update of the Quran Explorer app:
◉ Introducing AI-powered Search — now available in the Search section
◉ General improvements and bug fixes for a smoother experience

apps.title: 教育王國 Education Kingdom - 教育討論區
apps.description:
"Education Kingdom is a social media platform providing users with all-inclusive information on education in Hong Kong, from preschool to secondary school levels. Topics cover course materials, school curriculum, study planning, extracurricular activities, studying overseas, students with special educational needs (SEN), and trading of secondhand study materials, etc."

Education Kingdom also provides users with abundant practical and the most up-to-date information on study planning and teaching methods in different primary and secondary schools in Hong Kong. It allows users to share and discuss the current hot topic or news in the education industry, and to get an answer to the question that every parent will face when dealing with study planning. 

Special features of Education Kingdom mobile app include: 
1. Parent members’ tips on school places allocation/admission – Parents Members will share their hands-on experience in and strategies on finding the right kindergarten and primary schools for your children and planning for secondary school study. 
2. KOL shares their keys in learning and studying – Experts and internet celebrities will share their unique methods and skills to improve the learning efficiency of your children.
3. Information on local and overseas studies – whether you are planning for your children to study overseas or not, check the ranking and reputation of different schools in our mobile app before making any decision. 
4. "Whole-person development – Feeling lost in choosing the right extra-curricular activities among the different varieties available in the market? In Education Kingdom forum, users can share and exchange information on various tutorial classes, interest classes or even volunteering activities. You will find the right one to match with your children's interest and talent."
5. Students with special educational needs (SEN) – Fellow members will share their hands-on experience and thoughts in taking care of children with special education needs, allowing both you and your children to grow together in a supportive and encouraging environment. 
6. Second-hand market to trade for what you need – used textbooks, school uniforms, musical instruments, Education Kingdom allows you to share your resources in exchange of what you need and be eco-friendly. 
7. Bookmark hot topics and browse anywhere – a personalised bookmark list will allow you to join or follow any hot topics or discussions with one simple touch on your mobile. 
8. Instant direct messaging – Having problems in planning your education and study and want to chat with individual member directly? Use the direct messaging chatroom on our mobile app.

apps.title: Canvas Parent
apps.description:
Stay connected. Encourage success.
Canvas Parent helps parents and guardians track student progress, support learning, and communicate with teachers in real time.

What you can do
• Communicate: Message teachers directly to ask questions or follow up on school updates or particular grade & page
• Check progress: View grades, assignments, due dates, and homework across all courses
• Get alerts: Receive real-time notifications for missing work, low scores, or new announcements
• Encourage: See teacher feedback, celebrate milestones, and help your student stay organized
• Plan ahead: Use the calendar view to track upcoming tasks, events, and class updates

Canvas Parent is more than a grade monitor—it’s a progress tracker that helps families and schools work together.

Canvas Parent helps parents and guardians track student progress, support learning, and communicate with teachers in real time.

Canvas Parent is more than a grade monitor—it’s a progress tracker that helps families and schools work together.

apps.title: Math Hit - Educational Games
apps.description:
Math Hit – Brain Puzzle Games is a fun, fast-paced math and logic puzzle game designed for players of all ages. Whether you're a student looking to improve your math skills or an adult who enjoys brain-training games, Math Hit offers an engaging experience that combines learning with excitement.

This is more than just a math game. It’s a unique combination of brain puzzles and math practice in a 3D racing format. Solve each challenge before your opponent, test your speed, and sharpen your logic.

Two Game Modes for Every Mind
Math Mode
Strengthen your core math skills:

Addition

Subtraction

Multiplication

Division

Number comparison (greater than, less than)

Even and odd numbers

Small vs large number identification

Brain Mode
Test your logical thinking with puzzles like:

Not a large number

Not an even number

Less than a number

Not a small number

Exclude a specific value

Brain challenges that improve problem-solving and decision-making

Key Features
Over 100 fun and challenging levels

Multiplayer 3D gameplay – compete to solve puzzles faster than your opponent

Simple yet smart UI designed for kids, teens, and adults

Works offline – no WiFi needed

Engaging logic challenges with a fun math twist

Clean design, bright colors, and smooth performance

Helpful for students preparing for exams or improving quick math

Developed for both casual and serious brain training

Who Is This Game For?
Kids aged 6+ learning foundational math

Students in need of daily mental math practice

Adults who enjoy logic and brain puzzles

Parents looking for educational games that keep kids engaged

Teachers and tutors wanting interactive math-based tools

Puzzle lovers who want a fresh challenge

What Makes Math Hit Unique?
Combines brain logic and school-level math into one fun experience

No complicated setups or sign-ups — just install and play

Exciting 3D races motivate you to think quickly and accurately

Great for daily practice, brain warmups, or casual puzzle time

Improves memory, attention span, logical reasoning, and math confidence

Why People Love Math Hit
“This is the most fun I’ve had doing math problems!”

“My kid loves racing through levels. Great learning app!”

“Perfect mix of challenge and fun. I play daily.”

Download and Play Today
If you’re ready to take your brain training and math skills to the next level, download Math Hit – Brain Puzzle Games today. Whether you're practicing for school, training your brain, or just looking for a new puzzle experience, this game has something for you.

Join thousands of players already improving their skills while having fun. New levels added regularly. Feedback and suggestions are welcome – help us build the best brain game experience.

Download now and start solving. Make math your superpower.

apps.title: Chess for Kids - Play & Learn
apps.description:
Learn to play chess with our beginner-friendly ChessKid app! Enjoy free chess games online and offline. Play with friends or challenge the chess bots and play chess against a computer!

Play chess the fun way with the ultimate chess app for kids — and for parents and coaches too! Learn both basic rules and advanced strategies of the world's greatest brain game, all with an app that is AD-FREE and 100% SAFE for kids. Learn valuable chess moves from self-teaching chess tutorials.

CHESS ONLINE FOR FREE:
- Play as many chess games as you want free of charge or join chess tournaments to compete with thousands of other chess players from all over the globe. Chess practice makes you better.

Enjoy multiple player vs. player modes:
- Play chess against your friends
- Slow chess
- Fast chess

It is up to you to decide.

Test your skill against other kids or battle against our funny chess bots! 

CHESS COMMUNITY
- ChessKid is much more than just an app. It is your chance to play chess for FREE with kids from around the world and join an amazing community of more than 50,000 players enjoying ChessKid games every month.
- Over 500,000 chess games are played each month by more than 200,000 active ChessKid users. 

PLAY CHESS ONLINE AND OFFLINE AGAINST THE COMPUTER
- Meet 10 funny chess bots perfect for all skill levels and suitable beginning players. They become your best playmates on your way to mastering chess strategies and tactics. Playing chess against a computer is a great way to practice your chess moves. Make chess practice part of your daily routine.

CHESS PUZZLES
- Sharpen your tactical skills and have fun with over 350,000 tricky puzzles.
- Solve up to three chess puzzles per day completely for free. Our puzzles help you become a chess pro in no time.

CHESS LESSONS
- Improve your game with amazing, kid-friendly chess coaching videos on rules and basics, strategy, chess tactics, openings, endgames and much more.
- Learn chess tactics from grandmasters and enjoy chess with our amazing FunMasterMike’s tutorials. He loves teaching chess and wants to share his knowledge with you. 
- Strengthen your skills with a crash course on how to deliver checkmate and become an unbeatable chess player. Learn from the best chess tutorials.

Chess, ajedrez, xadrez, satranç, scacchi, schach, شطرنج … no matter the language, no matter the name, chess is the world’s best strategy game.

Playing chess games is completely free and unlimited for all players on the apps and website. Puzzles and videos are unlimited for Gold members. Kids can only chat in games with their parents; no other free chat is allowed. They cannot make friends with anyone without explicit parental permission. Parents have full control over kids’ accounts.

ChessKid is the best app for kids who strive to get better at chess. With our app, mastering chess will never be boring. Our funny cartoon characters serve as chess trainers and help you become a chess pro. Join the ChessKid family today!

ABOUT CHESSKID:
ChessKid is built by Chess.com - #1 in chess online.
ChessKid is the #1 scholastic chess app.
ChessKid is trusted by over 2,000 schools and 3 million kids worldwide.
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/ChessKidcom
Twitter: http://twitter.com/chesskidcom
Terms of Use: https://www.chesskid.com/legal#termsofservice

- Play and learn chess to unlock new avatar items
- Earn gems to purchase outfits
- Customize your look with some of the coolest fits around

apps.title: Starfall ABCs
apps.description:
The Starfall™ ABCs app contains a free selection of activities from Starfall.com. This app is the first step of Starfall’s free Learn-to-Read sequence, which includes all of the basics for learning to read.  

Starfall™ activities motivate through exploration, positive reinforcement, and play. Children delight as they see, hear, and interact with letters and sounds in words, sentences, and games. They learn to recognize letters while developing the skills they need to become confident readers. All children, especially English language learners, benefit. 

The Starfall™ website and applications are program services of Starfall Education Foundation, a 501(c)(3) publicly supported nonprofit organization. Copyright © 2002–2023 by Starfall Education. All rights reserved. 

Starfall provides an Enhanced Accessible Index for children with visual, hearing, or mobility impairments. For more information, please contact Customer Service at (+1) 303-417-6414.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
This version of Starfall™ ABCs includes minor graphic updates and performance enhancements for a smoother user experience.
Have fun exploring the alphabet, singing and learning!

apps.title: MOE UAE
apps.description:
The Ministry of Education in the UAE introduces its mobile app to improve the level and variety of services it provides.
MOE mobile app is a channel for the public to benefit of the e-Services provided by the Ministry of Education. Through its user-friendly interface, you can request services related to both Higher Education and General Education (eg. Attestation Services, Certificate equivalency services, Apply for scholarship service, verify the authenticity of equivalency or attestation of certificates, Inquiries, Suggestions, and Complaints features) among other various services.
In addition to educational services, MOE mobile app provides many features such as Follow up application status, Access & download result documents of an application, Ministry News Feed, Contact Info, Frequently Asked Questions, MOE Services Guidelines, Inquiry, Complaints, and suggestion services… etc.

raw_data.releaseNotes:

apps.title: Kun Academy
apps.developer: F O C U S INFORMATION STUDIES & CONSULTANCIES
apps.description:
Online learning platform in both Arabic and English languages.

Kun Academy is an online educational platform that provides online courses and Master Classes in different specialties and fields presented by worldwide best instructors and top experts. Various types of online training such as classic traditional training through video, interactive training through using artificial intelligence, and academic training.

Our interactive online courses encourage you to stay engaged through various scenarios, questionnaires to test your progress as you go. We also choose the dubbing service to deliver educational courses in both Arabic language & English language.

Learn new skills, pursue your interests, or boost your career from a wide range of online courses: Master Classes, Marketing, Public Speaking, Leadership, Programming & Technology, Journalism & Mass Communication, Business Management, Directing and photography, Drawing, Freelancing and more.

A quick glimpse at the subjects we provide:

Master Class: Provides our students with a complete learning path that will ensure acquiring essential skills, practices necessary to master any particular topic such as (cv writing, interviewing skills, job hunting strategies, presenting TV shows)

Media and Acting: Are you interested in performing on a stage, TV, or maybe doing commercials? Our Online Acting Classes have been developed by a distinguished team of acting experts providing you with the necessary skills, tools, and techniques that will jump-start your acting journey.

Personal Development: Our courses teach strategies and frameworks for personal growth, goal setting, and self-improvement. Learn time management skills, leadership, soft skills, communication skills & more.

Traditional & Online Marketing: Is one of the most demanded skills in the marketplace, all type of businesses requires a proper way to engage prospects & customers. That’s we provide a wide variety of marketing courses that will allow you to learn key skills in Marketing strategies, Influencers, SEO marketing, basics of Facebook, marketing content , consumer behaviors and much more.

Voice-Over and Radio presenting: Explore our wide variety of voice acting courses that will give you insider tips on how to be successful as a voice-over recording artist. Begin carving your path to become a narrative storyteller or voice actor.

Public Speaking: Presenting in front of a crowd isn’t an easy job to pull off! Our online interactive courses in Public speaking will enable you to learn vital skills to excel in the art of speaking & presenting in front of any type of crowd.

Script Writing, news editing, documentary programs and diplomatic responses: Learn the key concepts and fundamental principles involved in the process of screenwriting, whether if it's for a film or tv. We assure you to become an expert storyteller by the end of it.

Drawing: Entry into the world of drawing does not depend on the skill alone, there are many rules and foundations whose application is an important factor in mastering this art, learn now foundation of drawing, watercolor painting, contrast and more.

Astronomy & Astrology Science: If you are one of those who believe in that type of art, For the first time in the middle east, we provide a unique course that deals with how human beings attribute meaning to the planets, stars, and sky providing you with the knowledge to discover the secrets of how to interpret horoscopes.

Once completing a course, you will receive a completion certificate that reflects their professional expertise in whichever chosen topic. The certification can be used to support their CV on various social media platforms and employment sites and enables them to compete and have priority to obtain the desired job.

Get to know us at: www.kun.academy
Find more about our recent posts at: https://kun.academy/blogs/

apps.title: Concorde Education
apps.description:
Concorde Education: Empowering Subject Matter Experts
Connect. Teach. Inspire.
Welcome to Concorde Education, the dedicated app for Subject Matter Experts (SMEs) looking to make a significant impact in educational institutions across the United States.
What We Offer for SMEs:
Valuable Connections: Join a network where your expertise is in high demand. Connect with a diverse range of schools seeking your specialized knowledge and experience.
Nationwide Opportunities: No matter where you are, find schools across the USA that can benefit from your expertise. Our platform bridges geographical gaps, opening doors to new teaching experiences.
Flexible Engagement: Choose how you engage. Whether it's short-term projects, ongoing collaborations, or guest lectures, Concorde Education offers a variety of formats to suit your schedule and preferences.

apps.title: Build Bright University
apps.description:
With a humble beginning in 2000 as a Faculty of Management and Law (FML), today, Build Bright University (BBU) is one of the leading universities in Cambodia having its eight campuses in different parts of the country. Along with the central campus at Phnom Penh, the other provincial campuses are at Siem Reap, Battambang, Banteay Meanchey, Preah Sihanouk, Takeo, Rattanakiri and Stung Treng. The university is recognized by the Ministry of Education, Youth and Sport of the Royal Government of Cambodia. Guided by the vision of H.E. Dr. In Viracheat, since 2002, BBU has been marching ahead toward meeting its social commitment.

Realizing the need of trained and skilled workforce for the country as well as the region, BBU through its several faculties and school offers Associate, Bachelor, Master and Doctoral programs as approved by the Ministry of Education, Youth and Sport. In addition, the university regularly conducts client-based training programs, research and consultancies. The university has the credibility of successfully placing its graduates in public, private and non-government organizations.

apps.title: MoEYS
apps.developer: Ministry of Education, Youth and Sports of Cambodia
apps.description:
MoEYS E-Learning App is an official self-directed learning platform under the auspice of Ministry of Education Youth and Sport and the Union of Youth Federations of Cambodia. This App comprises of features that support and encourage students to take the personal initiative, with or without the assistance of others, in diagnosing their learning needs, formulating learning goals, and evaluating learning outcomes. Those features include:
- Video contents: produced by professionally experienced teachers in Cambodia on a wide range of lessons and grades.
- E-Library: PDF version of MoEYS textbooks as well as other significant Khmer e-books that students can freely access offline on their mobile devices.
- Self-assessment: students are able to do self-assessment and acquire the results for further self-direct learning.
- News: updated information notified on mobile device.
- User Profile: User can register and store their personal information on the App and the result of their self- assessment.

apps.description:
Nearpod: Interactive Lessons That Engage Every Student   

Nearpod helps K–12 teachers create engaging, student-centered learning experiences that drive participation and deepen understanding. Whether you're teaching math, science, ELA, or any other subject, Nearpod gives you the tools to bring your lessons to life.  Use interactive features like polls, quizzes, and virtual reality to spark curiosity and keep students involved. Monitor progress with real-time formative assessments and adjust instruction based on instant feedback. With flexible teaching modes, you can lead live lessons or assign student-paced activities that fit your classroom flow.

Why Teachers Love Nearpod:   
Interactive slides, videos, and activities that promote active learning  
Real-time insights to support data-informed instruction   
Seamless integration with Google Slides, YouTube, and your LMS   
Access to 22,000+ standards-aligned lessons and resources   
Tools for differentiation and student voice     

Nearpod works with the platforms you already use and adapts to your teaching style. Whether you're enhancing your curriculum or building lessons from scratch, Nearpod helps you deliver instruction that sticks.

How Nearpod works:
1. Learning experiences are created by teachers from scratch, uploading slides, with AI (on tablet or web), or selected from a catalogue of over 22,000 experiences found in the Nearpod Library.  
2. Students join synchronous learning experiences led by their teachers or learn at their own pace. 
3. Students actively engage in interactive media, formative assessments, and activities such as videos, quizzes, polls, 3D objects, virtual reality, drawing tools, and more.
4. Teachers receive immediate insights into student learning, allowing them to provide feedback, correct misconceptions, and adjust instruction.  5. Students are introduced to content through dynamic multimedia that includes VR Field trips, 3D objects, PhET simulations, BBC videos and more. 
 

 To make your technology integration as seamless as possible, Nearpod has partnered with:
Apple
Google
Microsoft
Canvas
Schoology
Brightspace by D2L
Blackboard
Moodle
Clever
ClassLink

 What teachers are saying:
 "Nearpod provides me and my teachers with an excellent tool for engaging students. Activities and the different functions offer opportunities for differentiation and collection of assessment data. Nearpod is a game changer for teachers and students." - Matthew M., Assistant Principal

 "Nearpod gives teachers a wonderful superpower. It allows us to see the answer every students would give to every question we ask in class and allows students to feel more comfortable taking risks with their learning and growth." - Ann K., Instructional Coach

  Nearpod consistently gets me 90-100% engagement by keeping students active in their learning while helping build a stronger learning environment. - Amanda D., High school teacher  

SUBSCRIBING IN-APP:
- Subscribe to Nearpod Gold Edition annually ($159.99). You will be charged in your local currency at the prevailing exchange rate as defined by the App Store.
- Payment will be charged to your Apple ID account at confirmation of purchase.
- Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period.
- Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal.
- Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user’s Account Settings after purchase.
- No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during the active subscription period.
- Privacy policy: nearpod.com/privacy-policy
- Terms of use: nearpod.com/terms-conditions
- Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription.
 
Download Nearpod now and sign up for a FREE account or log in to start experiencing the magic of Nearpod!

apps.title: BurlingtonEnglish
apps.description:
What is BurlingtonEnglish?

BurlingtonEnglish is a unique blended English program for adults. It offers comprehensive General English Courses as well as a wide range of Career Courses, and provides a complete language-learning solution. Students get any time-anywhere access to state-of-the-art online interactive courses.
Burlington’s cutting-edge speech technology, the SpeechTrainer®, provides individualized feedback and instruction in pronunciation. 

With BurlingtonEnglish, students effectively improve their pronunciation, vocabulary and overall fluency, giving them the confidence to communicate successfully in any situation.

Special Features:

- SpeechTrainer®
Individualized Pronunciation Feedback and Instruction 
This patented speech processing technology helps learners perfect their pronunciation and listening skills.  The SpeechTrainer® analyzes students’ spoken English, adapts to a wide variety of accents to discern specific difficulties, and corrects mispronunciations through individualized training. This will help improve students’ pronunciation, comprehensibility, and confidence to successfully communicate in English.


- Mobile Vocabulary Practice
Vocabulary Practice Any Time, Anywhere! 
Mobile Vocabulary Practice allows students to get additional vocabulary practice on the go. Students can access wordlists for their courses to reinforce their language learning whenever and wherever they are.

- Using Your Computer
Through a series of short animated videos, students develop basic digital literacy skills such as maneuvering the mouse and using the keyboard, as well as gain a basic understanding of a computer. It is designed for learners with limited English proficiency and limited-to-no digital literacy, using easy-to-follow visual demonstrations. 

- Personalized, Data-Driven Learning!
Real-time feedback and reporting to track, monitor and measure progress encourage students and motivate them to learn.


And many more unique and exciting features!!!

This results-driven program, with 24/7 online access, is engaging for English language learners, and helps them to become more productive and successful members of the workforce and their communities.

apps.title: Tennessee Lottery Official App
apps.description:
The TN Lottery App is the official app of the Tennessee Education Lottery Corporation.

Scan your tickets, create a mobile playslip, find a retailer, view current jackpots, save your lucky numbers or create/login to your VIP Rewards Account for more ways to win.

Features:

• Check your tickets to see if you’re a winner, anywhere and anytime

• View available instant games and their top prizes

• See current jackpot amounts for Powerball, Mega Millions, Daily Tennessee Jackpot, Lotto America and Tennessee Cash

• View past winning numbers for Powerball, Mega Millions, Daily Tennessee Jackpot, Lotto America, CASH 4 LIFE, Tennessee Cash, Cash 3, Cash 4, and KENO To Go

• Use the retailer locator to find a retailer near you

• Create a mobile playslip to scan to purchase a ticket at your favorite retailer

• Save your lucky numbers to access them on the go

• Access your VIP Rewards Account to enter tickets, earn points and enter drawings

• Sign-up for VIP News Alerts to stay in-the-know on new promotions and offerings

Want more ways to connect with the Tennessee Lottery?

General Information: https://bit.ly/30ZvvBE
VIP Rewards: https://bit.ly/3fRnLpx
Facebook: https://bit.ly/2BptH9X
Instagram: https://bit.ly/3ej7skJ
Twitter: https://bit.ly/3hDgQlr
YouTube: https://bit.ly/3dfELUG

Play responsibly. Must be 18 or older to play.

The Tennessee Lottery encourages adults to establish appropriate parental controls on mobile devices accessed by children under the age of 18 to limit their ability to download or access this app.

For questions or comments regarding VIP Rewards, please contact the Tennessee Lottery VIP Member Support at 1-800-728-6932 or via email at VIP@tnlottery.com.The TN Lottery App is the official app of the Tennessee Education Lottery Corporation.

apps.title: Classera
apps.description:
Classera breaks the classroom walls to provide you with a unique experience to share every successful moment, and get access to limitless educational resources...
Classera brings inspiration and fun to every moment you spend in learning something new!
Classera is your smart mate that understands you & gives you exactly what you need when you need it to keep you always ahead of others.
كلاسيرا يكسر جدران الفصول الدراسية لتوفر لك تجربة فريدة من نوعها لتشارك كل لحظات النجاح، ولتحصل على موارد تعليمية لا حدود لها ...
كلاسيرا يجلب إلهام ومتعة لكل لحظة تقضيها في تعلم شيء جديد!
كلاسيرا هو زميلك الذكي الذي يفهم عليك ويعطيك ما تحتاج إليه بالتحديد عندما تحتاج إليه، ويبقيك دائما قبل الآخرين

This app is only available for Classera users, if your school is already registered with Classera please refer to them for your account information.
هذا التطبيق متاح فقط لمستخدمين كلاسيرا، إذا تم تسجيل مدرستك بالفعل مع كلاسيرا يرجى الرجوع إليها للحصول على معلومات حسابك.

Some of the course materials might require you to install external apps to be able to view and use.
بعض المواد الدراسية قد تتطلب منك تثبيت تطبيقات خارجية لتتمكن من عرضها واستخدامها.

apps.title: Rosetta Stone: Learn Languages
apps.description:
Learning a language can be an experience that transforms your life. Over 25 years of language learning experience has taught Rosetta Stone one thing: everyone has the ability to learn to read, write, and speak a language with confidence. Try the Rosetta Stone app yourself for free. 

Many online language learning apps will promise that you can learn a language in just a few minutes a day. However, there is a significant difference between memorizing vocabulary lists and speaking a language with confidence. Learning a language is about more than just the words. One of the mistakes new language learners make is treating language as an object or an end goal instead of as an experience.

Ditch the books, translator, and dictionary, and surround yourself with a language whenever, wherever with the Rosetta Stone mobile app. 



What are people saying about Rosetta Stone:
• CNN Underscored - "There’s a good reason why the language learning app Rosetta Stone is the gros chien (that is, the big dog) of the apps we tested"
• Mashable - "one of the OG language-learning services, known for its deep dive into accent pronunciation"
• Popular Science - "super-smooth and intuitive, and the lessons neither feel too short so as to be forgettable nor too long so as to be a chore"
• PC Mag - "reliable, accurate, and thorough"



Rosetta Stone has taught millions of people new languages, and you’re next. From day one, you’ll: 
• Stay focused with a personalized language learning plan based on your motivation. 
• Learn a language intuitively using our proven immersion method. 
• Perfect your pronunciation with instantaneous feedback. 
• Download lessons to do everything offline.  
• Access different kinds of exercises with our Extended Learning features. 
• Sync progress across all your devices. 
• And never see an ad, ever. 



For the first time, we’re offering every one of our languages under one subscription. Flip between languages as often as you’d like and enjoy the freedom to get seriously curious. To access, simply select Unlimited Languages when you subscribe. 


Choose from 24 languages: 
Arabic, Chinese (Mandarin), Dutch, English (American or British), Filipino (Tagalog), French, German, Greek, Hebrew, Hindi, Irish, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Persian (Farsi), Polish, Portuguese (Brazil), Russian, Spanish (Latin American or Spain), Swedish, Turkish, or Vietnamese. 



Select a subscription: 
We offer 3 and 12-month subscriptions—as well as a Lifetime option. 



Subscription Details:
• Get full access to all lessons, stories, and audio companion when you subscribe to Rosetta Stone. 
• Payment will be charged to your Apple ID. 
• Your account will be auto-renewed 24 hours prior to the end of the current period.
• Manage or cancel your subscription from your App Store User Settings at any time after purchasing. Payment will be taken until the end of the current period.
• Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable.



Enterprise and Education Learners
• Unlimited use of Rosetta Stone's mobile app is available for existing Enterprise and Education Learners.
• Features may vary for Enterprise and Education Learners.


For questions or assistance, please visit http://support.rosettastone.com



Learn a language today with Rosetta Stone.


Learn Spanish (Latin American or Spain)
Learn French
Learn German
Learn Italian
Learn English (American or British)
Learn Japanese
Learn Korean
Learn Chinese (Mandarin)
Learn Arabic
Learn Portuguese (Brazil)
Learn Russian
Learn Dutch
Learn Filipino (Tagalog)
Learn Greek
Learn Hebrew

Learn Persian (Farsi)
Learn Polish
Learn Swedish
Learn Turkish
Learn Vietnamese



For questions or assistance, please visit http://support.rosettastone.com

apps.title: Handshake Jobs & New Careers
apps.description:
Handshake: Careers start here
Handshake is the #1 app for job seekers starting or restarting their careers. 
Whether you're figuring out what’s next or ready to apply, Handshake helps you find jobs and internships, explore career paths, and connect with people and events that move your career forward.
With personalized job recommendations and real talk from people who are (or have been) in your shoes, Handshake is the career network built for where you are now, and where you’re going next.

Personalized job recs
Get suggestions for jobs, internships, and events based on your profile, interests, and where you are in your career journey.

Real career advice
Grow your career with posts, videos, and articles from people who’ve done it before—and see what it’s really like to navigate job searches, interviews, and early career life.

Career-shaping events
Meet with employers face-to-face at in-person and virtual career fairs, networking sessions, resume workshops, and more. Access real events to grow your skills and get hired.

Helpful networking
Find and connect with a network of peers, mentors, and thought leaders to get career support. Build your support system that helps you succeed now and later.

Other features job seekers love:
 - Easy job and internship search, with filters based on your major, goals, and preferences
 - Application tracking and deadline reminders
 - Customizable professional profile that helps you stand out to recruiters 
 - Access to your school’s career center, including events, appointments, and job collections

raw_data.releaseNotes:
3 updates from us this week:

· If your profile visibility is set to "private," you’re missing out on important opportunities to post to the feed, connect with others, and get messages about jobs. So now, you’ll see the button to create a post from the feed (or the "Create yours" button on certain posts)—tap it, and you’ll get the option to change your visibility settings. Switch to "community" to unlock the ability to post, *and* the best Handshake experience in one fell swoop.
· New! Send jobs to people via DM, right from the job description.
· Link previews look cool now!

Handshake: Careers start here
Handshake is the #1 app for job seekers starting or restarting their careers. 
Whether you're figuring out what’s next or ready to apply, Handshake helps you find jobs and internships, explore career paths, and connect with people and events that move your career forward.
With personalized job recommendations and real talk from people who are (or have been) in your shoes, Handshake is the career network built for where you are now, and where you’re going next.

Personalized job recs
Get suggestions for jobs, internships, and events based on your profile, interests, and where you are in your career journey.

Real career advice
Grow your career with posts, videos, and articles from people who’ve done it before—and see what it’s really like to navigate job searches, interviews, and early career life.

Career-shaping events
Meet with employers face-to-face at in-person and virtual career fairs, networking sessions, resume workshops, and more. Access real events to grow your skills and get hired.

Helpful networking
Find and connect with a network of peers, mentors, and thought leaders to get career support. Build your support system that helps you succeed now and later.

Other features job seekers love:
 - Easy job and internship search, with filters based on your major, goals, and preferences
 - Application tracking and deadline reminders
 - Customizable professional profile that helps you stand out to recruiters 
 - Access to your school’s career center, including events, appointments, and job collections

apps.title: Dictionary.com: English Words
apps.description:
Download the #1 free dictionary app!

With more than 2 million trusted definitions and synonyms, this English dictionary and thesaurus app for iPhone is optimized for your mobile device. Improve your English vocabulary, whether you're just starting your learning journey or you're already a word wizard. Install the app for access to definitions and synonyms whenever and wherever you need them — no bulky books necessary. Flip to dark mode to give your eyes a break, or stick to the traditional set-up. 

In addition to the trusted reference content from Dictionary.com and Thesaurus.com, this education app includes:

Word of the Day ► Learn a new word each day and expand your vocabulary.

Example Sentences ► Browse real-world example sentences to see how words are used.

Idioms ► Explore how words can gain new meanings.

Rhymes ► Finish every verse. 

Audio Pronunciations ► Never mispronounce another word.

Grammar ► Get grammar tips, word usage, and more to improve your writing.

Editorial Articles ► Explore editorial content for features on words, the origins of the English language, and the nuances that make English so complicated and unique.

Search History ► Customize your recently searched word list, and never forget the newest words you’ve learned.

Dictionary Shuffle ► Think you know ALL the definitions? Prove it with Dictionary Shuffle, which chooses a word at random and brings you to the definition.

A-Z Dictionary ► What’s more exciting than ... wait for it … browsing the Dictionary?! We’ve now made it even easier, with the A–Z Dictionary.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
This release includes bug fixes and performance improvements. 

Questions? Send us an e-mail at support@dictionary.com

apps.title: Prodigy for Parents
apps.description:
The Prodigy Parent app is the perfect companion for busy parents who want to check on their child's Prodigy educational progress while on-the-go. You’ll get a direct line to your child’s success!

With the new Prodigy Parent app you will get access to:
- Instant notifications as your child progress through their curriculum-aligned skills tree 
- See at-a-glance insights into your child's mastered and struggling areas
- Set learning goals to help your child progress through their curriculum
- Send in-game rewards to encourage your learner
- Send an in-game cheer so they never forget they have you in their corner

See a difference in their learning over time with the Prodigy Parent app. The more the child plays, the more insights you get.

How does the Prodigy Parent App help with my child’s education? The Prodigy Parent App is a companion app to the award-winning kid’s game, Prodigy Math. Prodigy Math is a game-based educational tool for children to learn standards-aligned Math through a unique learning experience. Players can earn rewards, go on quests — all while learning new skills.

As a parent, you will get insights and data delivered on their educational progression right to the palm of your hand in the Prodigy Parent App.

Here's what parents are saying about Prodigy:
"Prodigy is a great way to get kids who don't like math into math."
Caralena L.

"Prodigy is an engaging way to keep your child interested in learning new math skills and facts."
Amber G

"My son actually begs me to let him play Prodigy."
Rainah P.

Recipient of the prestigious 2022 National Parenting Product Award
iKeepSafe FERPA Certification
iKeepSafe COPPA Safe Harbor Certification


Privacy Policy: https://www.prodigygame.com/main-en/privacy-policy/
Terms and conditions: https://www.prodigygame.com/main-en/terms-and-conditions/

apps.title: McGraw Hill K-12 Portal
apps.description:
The McGraw Hill K-12 Portal app lets students easily access McGraw Hill courses, eBooks, and resources anytime, anywhere. To get started, simply log in with your username and password. You will see all your McGraw Hill courses and can select a course to view the eBook and resources.

Enjoy a mobile-friendly reading experience in your eBook with easy navigation and helpful viewing tools like pinch, zoom, and text search. Select on-page links to view interactive resources and use the embedded tools (notes, bookmark, highlighter, and even a pen to write on the screen) to stay organized.
        
Looking for a specific resource? Quickly locate what you need with search and filter options.
        
Need to work offline? No problem! K-12 Portal supports offline access – you can even take notes, highlight, and place bookmarks while you are offline. Everything will sync when you reconnect to wi-fi or data.

apps.title: Monster Math : Kids Fun Games
apps.description:
Embark on an EPIC math adventure with Monster Math games!

With Monster Math, kids explore exciting new planets, take on missions to save them, and collect cool badges. And the best part? They’re building their math skills while having a blast playing the game!

Students flag off their journey by creating a profile and diving into a math journey adapted for their grade. Monster Math is designed by educators & grounded in research by Math Fact Fluency Expert Dr. Jennifer Bay-Williams. It sets the stage for kids' educational journey and builds their math facts skill step by step as their young minds explore fun and challenging math planets, mastering one math skill at a time in a fun game based format so immersive that they won’t even realize they are learning math.

With Monster Math, practicing math is nothing like doing worksheets or just recognizing flashcards.Kids take on mini math missions and build confidence as they get better at addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division in a fun and engaging way!

Winner of the Brain Child Award and National Parenting Product Award in 2020!


WHY MONSTER MATH? 

Focus on building Number Sense: Instead of rote memorization only, Monster Math focuses on using visual cues to help kids understand how operations work, learn basic and advanced fact strategies, and in general get very flexible with numbers. 


It’s Engaging: We believe learning should spark joy, be visual, interactive, and fun. That’s why at Monster Math, we create mini math missions that feel like games while helping kids master key concepts!

It’s aligned: Every mission in Monster Math is carefully designed to align with the Core curriculum as well as various state curriculums across the US, ensuring that kids are practicing the right skills at the right time. 

Designed for early elementary Grades: Monster Math covers key math concepts for 1st to 3rd graders, all aligned with Common Core standards.

Stress-Free Learning: No time limits, no penalties, and no distractions, just pure math fun in a safe, ad-free environment!

Play Anytime, Anywhere: Monster Math works offline, so kids can access the app and enjoy learning on the go, anytime and anywhere!

WHAT PARENTS SAY ABOUT MONSTER MATH

“My son has ADHD and loves the game. He is able to sit and play for an extended period of time. Without realizing that he is also learning. I highly recommend this game.” — Justin P’s Mom

“Super excited that we found this one. I think this is the most fine learning apps online” — Areiladas1013

MONSTER MATH FOR PARENTS
Monster Math isn’t just fun, it’s effective! Coming soon: You’ll get clear progress reports and skill breakdowns so you can easily track how your child is improving.

MONSTER MATH FOR TEACHERS
Monster Math is free for teachers. Use it to build Math fact fluency for your students. With student profiles, multiple kids can use the same device and still track their progress independently.

SUBSCRIBE ONCE, LEARN FOREVER
Sign up for a free 7-day trial to explore our learning experience. After the trial, subscribe annually for just $59.99/year.

With one annual subscription, which works across multiple devices, your child unlocks all missions, updates, and future content.

Subscription info:
- Makkajai subscriptions are auto-renewable and annual with a 7-day Free Trial
- Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at the end of the Free trial
- Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period
- Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user’s Account Settings after purchase
- Cancellation will not go into effect until the end of the monthly billing cycle

For support, questions or comments, write to us at: support@makkajai.com
Our privacy policy can be found at: http://www.makkajai.com/privacy-policy
Our terms of use can be found at: http://www.makkajai.com/terms
Connect with us on Facebook & Instagram

Our Values
Helpful: To be caring to the society in uplifting students essentially so they could meet the basic needs of education.

Evolve: To always grow and assist the students in need and create a revolution in the field of education.

Perseverance: To endure in all situations and conditions to help the students and to support the society

Integrity: To be always principled in the way we follow the rules set by our government and in the way of using the trust funds to help students and the society at large.

Noble: To always be noble in the actions we take as a Trust and to consider the moral standards every time a decision is taken.
