apps.title: 百度文库-GenFlow全能AI内容获取及创作
apps.developer: Beijing Baidu Netcom Science & Technology Co.,Ltd
apps.description:
GenFlow2.0重磅发布！把100个专家装进口袋——自主思考规划执行复杂任务，多AI工具智能调用并行执行，支持随时暂停追问，分钟级同时交付PPT、研报、绘本、代码、海报、图表等多模态结果。GenFlow2.0版本，开启AI新时代的工作生活。

百度文库，一站式智能写作与文档资源集合平台，正式接入DeepSeek R1满血版，文档查找、编辑、资料管理一应俱全，AI内容生成能力再升级，办公学习好助手。

【AI智能生成 文档/PPT/海报/画本等】
1. 根据输入的主题及内容要求，一键生成格式标准、内容个性化的范文；
2. 基于主题或文档，快速生成多图PPT，海量精美PPT模版随心选择，一键搭配应用；
3. 定制专属AI海报：输入主题即可生成，支持编辑文案、更新配图、上传本地图片等；
4. 思维导图、研究报告、小红书/朋友圈文案、小说/漫画配图文案，也可快速生成，满足学习、工作、休闲等多场景写作需求；
5. 支持输入主题生成、基于文库文档生成或选择上传文档、模版进行生成，也可多文档合并参考生成，高效便捷一键搞定；
【AI随心编辑】
1. 智能总结与问答，精准提炼文章要点，充分理解和学习文章内容做出个性化回答；
2. 辅助润色美化文案，支持一键扩写、续写或改写内容；格式排版，查找替换，功能一应俱全；
3. 场景化伴随式交互，让内容创作与阅读更加流畅自如；多场景语音交互，简单口语化指令直接进行编辑或生成；
【海量文档资料查找】
14亿专业文档，内容涵盖各行各业，随查随用，一键搜索，智能推荐。
1. 实用文档：简历模版、PPT素材、心得体会、计划方案、公关文件、总结汇报、制度表格、英语学习、工作范文、考研资料等文档模版；
2. 教学资料：幼儿园、中小学、大学、职业教育等各阶段所需的课件教案，PPT模版、真题、习题、答案、作文、知识点总结、考研文件、教师工作文档、汇报PPT等；
3. 考试真题：英语四六级、英语专业考试、计算机二级、考研攻略、公务员、教师、会计、医药、建筑、证券、保险等资格考试真题、答案、习题、讲解PPT等； 
4. 合同模版：租房购房、店铺租赁、劳务借贷、汽车买卖、工程建设、赔偿申诉、离婚协议、遗产继承等； 
5. 专业资料：学术论文、报告、K12、考研、医药、建筑、法律、英语、财经等不同领域资料文件；
【资料库管理】
1. 最近浏览/收藏/下载内容随时查看，百度文库APP、文库小程序、文库网页多端数据实时同步；
2. 支持文件夹创建，文档进行分类管理，版面呈现更清晰，有效便捷查阅内容；
3. 支持上传本地文档或微信聊天记录中文件，个人私有化管理，数据隐私安全不外漏；
【实用工具】
1. 文档格式转换，如word、PDF、PPT等多格式进行切换；
2. 文档导入导出、打印、发送等快捷操作；
3. 语音速记、图片转文字等便捷功能；
4. 扫描查词、英语翻译等学习辅助工具；
各种实用工具，助你随时随地，高效工作学习。

【自动续费百度文库会员】
订阅名称：百度文库会员连续包月
时间：购买后立即生效
周期时长：1个月
如何取消：请手动打开苹果手机“设置”-->进入“iTunes Store与App Store”-->点击“Apple ID”，选择“查看Apple ID”，进入“账户设置”页面，点击“订阅”，选择百度文库VIP取消订阅即可，如未在订阅期结束的至少24小时关闭订阅，此订阅将自动续订。
隐私协议：https://tanbi.baidu.com/h5-business/browse/privacy_policy
会员协议：https://tanbi.baidu.com/san-home/vip_protocol
自动续费服务协议：https://tanbi.baidu.com/san-home/auto_pay_protocol

在百度文库，开启内容创作新篇章！

4. 思维导图、研究报告、小红书/朋友圈文案、小说/漫画配图文案，也可快速生成，满足学习、工作、休闲等多场景写作需求；
5. 支持输入主题生成、基于文库文档生成或选择上传文档、模版进行生成，也可多文档合并参考生成，高效便捷一键搞定；
【AI随心编辑】
1. 智能总结与问答，精准提炼文章要点，充分理解和学习文章内容做出个性化回答；
2. 辅助润色美化文案，支持一键扩写、续写或改写内容；格式排版，查找替换，功能一应俱全；
3. 场景化伴随式交互，让内容创作与阅读更加流畅自如；多场景语音交互，简单口语化指令直接进行编辑或生成；
【海量文档资料查找】
14亿专业文档，内容涵盖各行各业，随查随用，一键搜索，智能推荐。
1. 实用文档：简历模版、PPT素材、心得体会、计划方案、公关文件、总结汇报、制度表格、英语学习、工作范文、考研资料等文档模版；
2. 教学资料：幼儿园、中小学、大学、职业教育等各阶段所需的课件教案，PPT模版、真题、习题、答案、作文、知识点总结、考研文件、教师工作文档、汇报PPT等；
3. 考试真题：英语四六级、英语专业考试、计算机二级、考研攻略、公务员、教师、会计、医药、建筑、证券、保险等资格考试真题、答案、习题、讲解PPT等； 
4. 合同模版：租房购房、店铺租赁、劳务借贷、汽车买卖、工程建设、赔偿申诉、离婚协议、遗产继承等； 
5. 专业资料：学术论文、报告、K12、考研、医药、建筑、法律、英语、财经等不同领域资料文件；
【资料库管理】
1. 最近浏览/收藏/下载内容随时查看，百度文库APP、文库小程序、文库网页多端数据实时同步；
2. 支持文件夹创建，文档进行分类管理，版面呈现更清晰，有效便捷查阅内容；
3. 支持上传本地文档或微信聊天记录中文件，个人私有化管理，数据隐私安全不外漏；
【实用工具】
1. 文档格式转换，如word、PDF、PPT等多格式进行切换；
2. 文档导入导出、打印、发送等快捷操作；
3. 语音速记、图片转文字等便捷功能；
4. 扫描查词、英语翻译等学习辅助工具；
各种实用工具，助你随时随地，高效工作学习。

apps.title: Candy's Hospital - Kids Educational Games
apps.description:
Hey, little doctor, our friend Candy has got an emergency! See, so many friends of her family are sick now because of the changeable weather. But don’t worry, she has opened a hospital for the sake of everyone’s health. With advanced medical facilities and comfortable environment, it could offer the patients great medical service. 

However, Candy still needs an excellent doctor to take care of the patients, please come to help, they will be deeply grateful.

How to play:
Open the game and choose a patient in the lobby to start. When you click the patient, his / her state of illness would be introduced. Let's get down to business right now. Clicking the “Treat” button, you can start to cure the patient in the treatment room. There are six kinds of instruments for you, only after making full use of each one your patient will be cured. And here comes a big surprise that every cured patient will give you loving hearts as award, with the precious hearts you will be able to make the hospital better and better. So what are you waiting for? Just collect more hearts to build the world top medical institution! Moreover, you can also dress up the adorable nurse in the lobby! Let’s try choosing your favorite suit or just dragging it onto Candy, then she will show up with a new look. Hurry up, you have to strut your stuff when it really counts!

Features:
- Over 30 medical instruments
- 8 different characters & 14 stories
- Abundant medical items for patients and various suits for the little nurse
- Collect more loving hearts to make the hospital better
- Continued improvements of this game, please feel free to send us your feedbacks and suggestions

Need You Know:
This app is totally free to download and play, some basic items are also free to use, but some additional items need you to purchase and pay to unlock. Therefore, if you do not want to use these items, please turn off the in-app purchase in your settings. Thanks.

apps.title: Go Spindle
apps.description:
With Spindle, nothing comes between you and great education jobs. There’s no middleperson. No recruiters. No pressure. And no hassle. It’s simply one of the very best job search apps available. Download Spindle today and you’re instantly empowered to find and apply for amazing education jobs—wherever you are, or wherever you want to be.

· Access to Top Jobs - You get direct access to the country’s top education jobs— speech pathologist, school psychologist, occupational therapy, special education and more.

· Real Pay Ranges - You won’t apply for a job without knowing what’s in it for you. You see the actual pay ranges so you can decide right away whether or not it’s what you’re looking for.

· No Recruiters - You know what you want to do, where you want to do it, and how much you want to earn. We took the middle person "out" and put you at the center of your job search.

· Effortless Applications - Applying for the education jobs you want (and declining the ones you don’t want) is as simple as a click. The power is literally at your fingertips.

· Easy Onboarding - All your onboarding and credentialing is done directly in the app. Our easy-to-use profile tracker walks you through every step.

· Total Control - You’re in charge of your schedule, your interviews, your timesheets and pretty much every phase of your education job search process. It really is all about you.

With Spindle, you get access to some of the country’s very best education jobs with real pay ranges. You apply for the ones you want. You schedule your own interviews. You run the show. Spindle is simply the hub you use to start or better your career. And it always revolves around you.

apps.title: ANTON: Preschool - Grade 8
apps.description:
ANTON is the free learning platform for school. 

A complete all-in-one curriculum for all subjects: reading and writing, math, science, languages, music, and ELL for preschool through grade 8.

▸ FREE, NO ADS: all of our learning content is completely free without any extra costs involved. No subscription needed.

▸ ALL SUBJECTS ALIGNED TO THE CURRICULUM: English language arts, math, science, social studies, music, biology, physics, Spanish, German, Italian, French, Portuguese and English (ELL).

▸ JOYFUL LEARNING: over 100,000 exercises, 200 interactive exercise types, explanations and learning games.

▸ FOR STUDENTS, TEACHERS AND PARENTS: easily create a class, assign homework and follow your student’s learning progress both in the classroom and at home.

▸ LEARN ANYWHERE AND ANYTIME: works on all devices and in the browser.

▸ MOTIVATIONAL GAMES: Earn coins through learning and play fun games.

Perfect for homeschooling and distance learning.

Suitable for kids with dyslexia and dyscalculia.

Used by schools around the globe.

Our team of authors is currently working to create new levels for additional grades and subjects.

We improve ANTON every day and listen to your feedback.

We’d love to hear from you: support@anton.app

For more information visit: http://anton.app

ANTON Plus:

ANTON is free for everyone and ad-free as well. However, you can further support our project and purchase ANTON Plus for a small amount. ANTON Plus allows you to download entire subjects and groups, learn without an internet connection and have even more creative options while designing your avatar.

Privacy statement:
https://anton.app/privacy

Terms of use:
https://anton.app/terms

apps.title: Basma: Smart Education System
apps.description:
** WINNER Kuwait Award for Education Technology 2023 **

** WINNER Sheikha Hessa Salem Al-Sabah Award for Educational Leadership 2022 in Arab Gulf **

** WINNER ESCWA Award for Arabic Digital Content 2022 In Middle East **

** WINNER ALECSO Arab Mobile Apps Award 2017 for Best App in Education **

Previous Name: Student Follow-Up System

What is Basma ?
It is an application that aims to improve the school work environment, as it allows the school administration to directly monitor the learner's situation during school hours, providing a set of various services that help teachers to perform their assigned tasks to reduce administrative burdens and raise their performance level within the classroom, which is reflected positively on the level of achievement The learner’s academic studies and reducing the financial burdens on the guardian through private lessons and others.
The system also allows to provide an innovative mechanism for evaluating the learner’s educational level, and a supervisory partnership between the educational institution and the learner’s guardian contributes to reducing negative phenomena inside the school building to prepare a generation of young people who are aware of their personality, maker of their identity and contributor to achieving the national vision.

Objectives:
1- Rationalizing the consumption of material resources in the educational institution.
2- Providing an easy and accurate way to follow up the learners educationally and pedagogically within the school building.
3- Reducing the burden on teachers assigned to administrative supervision and devote themselves to following up on the behavioral cases of students.
4- Reducing the negative phenomena inside the school building and enhancing the preventive security of the learners.
5- Contribute to instilling and strengthening the noble moral values ​​stemming from the teachings of our true Islamic religion and authentic Arab customs.
6- Providing the means to attract qualified faculty members and technical staff to ensure good investment and directing these elements to serve the education system and its lofty mission in order to develop educational environment.
7- Contribute to preparing a generation of young people who are aware of their personality, maker of their identity and contributor to achieving the national vision.

apps.title: bartleby: Math Homework Helper
apps.description:
Get the support you need to tackle your hardest homework assignments and trickiest problems; get to know bartleby—an app filled with experts ready to guide you through your homework!


WITH THE BARTLEBY APP YOU CAN:


• Browse 8+ Million Step-by-Step Textbook & Homework Explanations:
Access valuable insights for college textbook questions to help you efficiently tackle your schoolwork. Our expanding collection covers a wide range of topics, including math, history, engineering, business, accounting, biology, chemistry, geometry, and more. It’s like your own personal homework helper.

• Get 24/7 Expert Q&A Support:
Anytime you need help, simply snap a photo or ask a question to our subject matter experts and receive a detailed explanation in as fast as 30 minutes.* Our tutors cover 30+ subjects, from math to biology and everything in between, and are waiting 24/7/365 to assist you with your study needs.

• Easily Search Our Digital Database of Resources:
No more struggling with confusing websites or apps. Our easy-to-use resource library lets you quickly find helpful materials shared by fellow students—saving them to your profile for future reference. With dozens of subjects and courses available, you’ll have a hassle-free way to get the information you need to learn and succeed.

• Access 24/7 Online Support:
You’ll never study alone with bartleby! If you have a question about your app, your subscription, or how to use all the great services in our student suite, drop us a line and we’ll respond ASAP.

Subscribers to “bartleby learn” can seamlessly access 24/7 homework help, including math help, from our team of expert tutors through their phones, tablets, and supported mobile devices. We also offer textbook guides, study materials, and more. bartleby helps students learn on-the-go with expert guidance every step of the way.

OVER 30 SUBJECTS SUPPORTED, INCLUDING:
• BUSINESS: Accounting, Economics, Finance, Operations, Management, Marketing
 • ENGINEERING: Chemical, Civil, Computer, Electrical, Mechanical Engineering
 • MATH: Advanced Math, Algebra, Calculus, Geometry, Probability, Statistics, Trigonometry
 • SCIENCE: Physics, Biochemistry, Biology, Chemistry, Nursing
 • SOCIAL SCIENCE: Psychology, Sociology
Check Out Our New Subjects: Anatomy & Physiology, Earth Science, Geography, History, Political Science.


BARTLEBY REVIEWS:


Here’s what a real student had to say about bartleby’s focus on student success:

“Other study platforms online often only provide the result, which isn’t ideal for true learning. I appreciate the effort bartleby puts into providing high-quality, detailed guidance.” — Grant B, Georgetown University

Access “bartleby learn” for just $9.99/month with no long-term commitment—cancel anytime!**

Study smarter with bartleby. Homework made easier, faster, and more effective.

*Response times may vary based on subject and complexity. Median response time is 34 minutes, though some responses may take longer for new subjects.
**Payment willhttps://www.bartleby.com/terms be charged to your iTunes account upon purchase confirmation. Subscriptions renew automatically at $9.99 each month unless canceled.

Terms of use: https://www.bartleby.com/terms

apps.title: شعلة - درّب عقلك يومياً
apps.description:
أكثر من 15 مليون مستخدم! درب عقلك يوميا عبر ألعاب ذكاء علمية رائعة مع تطبيق شعلة. احصل على تمرين يومي خاص بك حسب المهارات الذهنية التي تود تطويرها.

تطبيق شعلة يقدم لك أكثر من 40 لعبة ذهنية لتقوية الذاكرة و التركيز واللغة والرياضيات وسرعة ردة الفعل. تم تصميم الألعاب بناء على دراسات علمية.

اكتشف معدل ذكائك الآن وقارنه مع الآخرين واستمر في رحلة تطوير عقلك وتحدي ذاتك!

Sholah is the first Arabic Personal Brain Trainer that helps you train your memory, attention, language, and problem solving skills. It provides you with a daily workout of entertaining cognitive games. Sholah includes over 40 educational games covering seven major cognitive areas. Get to know your brain's performance and compare it with others now!

-------------------------------------
(النسخة الكاملة)
تطبيق شعلة متاح مجانا ولكن يمكنك الاشتراك في النسخة الكاملة للحصول على برنامج تدريبي متكامل بالإضافة إلى مقارنة معدل ذكائك مع بقية المستخدين.

هذه الأسعار هي بالدولار الأمريكي USD، قد يتغير السعر بناء على العملة المحلية حسب الدولة التي تقيم فيها.

في حالة الإشتراك، سيتم سحب المبلغ من حساب الآي تيونز الخاص بك بعد تأكيد الإشتراك.
الإشتراك يتجدد تلقائيا إلا إذا قمت بغلق خاصية تجديد الاشتراك التلقائي قبل أكثر من 24 ساعة من انتهاء المدة الحالية.
سيتم سحب مبلغ الإشتراك للمدة القادمة في خلال آخر 24 ساعة من المدة الحالية، كما سيتم إخبارك بمبلغ الإشتراك.
يمكنك تعديل إشتراكاتك. كما يمكنك غلق خاصية تجديد الإشتراك التلقائي عن طريق إعدادات حساب الآي تيونز الخاص بك.

apps.title: NC Lottery Official Mobile App
apps.description:
The NC Lottery Official Mobile App makes playing the lottery even more fun with the thrill of possibility at your fingertips!
 
Features include:
 
· Ticket checker - scan your draw or scratch-off tickets to see if you have a winner
· Buy your favorite draw games with Online Play and view drawing results
· Scan or enter your tickets into Lucke-Rewards to collect points
· Play games, take a survey, or complete activities to collect more Lucke-Rewards points
· Automatically get entered into second chance drawings with eligible tickets
· Give a lottery gift with Online Play Gifting
· Redeem your points for entry into Lucke-Rewards drawings for cash and other great prizes
· Customize notifications to receive winning numbers & jackpot alerts
· Manage your NC Education Lottery account preferences
· Find the nearest retailer any time
 
With more ways to play, earn, and win, there’s no better time to download the NC Lottery Official Mobile App than right now!
 
An internet connection is required for access to most features. Please note, every effort has been made to ensure the information in this application is accurate; however, in the event of a discrepancy, the winning numbers and prize amounts in the official records of the North Carolina Education Lottery shall prevail.
 
Apple Inc. in no way sponsors, endorses, or administers any contests or lottery drawings.

apps.title: 洋葱学园-原洋葱数学小初高数学、物理多学科在线学习平台
apps.description:
洋葱AI超级进化
精准提升一假期，轻松领跑新学期
为什么1.1亿学生选择洋葱学园？如何用5分钟快速吃透重难知识点？

【AI定制班-精准适配，规划先行】
「每天30分钟，锁定新学习核心点，开学考试稳拿分」
洋葱AI定制班根据学生不同的学习要求为学生量身定制专属的学习方案。根据学生的实际学习情况，由AI融合教研专家的经验，为学生制定【专属暑假学习规划】。无论是想同步打基础，还是培优拓展拔高，还是升学段提前衔接，都可以找到独属于自己的学习规划。从【盲目刷题】到【精准规划】，每天学习30分钟，轻松掌握下学期核心知识点，新学期考试稳拿分。

【AI私教动画课-卡点秒破，思路全开】
「暂停一下，AI私教1秒解答你的问题」
既有真人课的互动，又有录播课的灵活，还能随时解答学生的疑问，动画课程形式充分带动学习兴趣。学生独自在家学习，遇到不懂的知识点随时暂停提问，AI私教随时答疑， 打造【实时陪学+深度解惑】体系。学习遇卡点，随时“召唤”AI私教！数学公式没听懂？深度解析公式形成原理；物理实验不理解？拆解实验操作与实验细节，知识逻辑“掰碎了喂”。从上课没听懂不敢问，到思路拆解更清晰，学习从此“有人陪，有人答。”学生自己在家学习也放心。

【拍照学习大师-授渔解题，真会真懂】
「拒绝直接抄答案，“拍学”一题通百题解」
行业首创【先讲知识点再解题】机制，遇到难题别再“搜题抄答案”！拍照上传，AI先定位知识点，用动画课拆解知识本质——数学函数题，推导公式，梳理解题路径；物理实验题，讲清原理，拆解步骤。把“被动抄答案”扭转成“主动学方法”，帮助学生学会题目背后的知识点，一通百通，进步肉眼可见。
拍照学习大师8月中旬即将上线，学习知识点的同时展示解题方法，双管齐下，效率更高

无论你是挣扎在《岳阳楼记》的文言迷宫，还是迷失在“牛顿定律”的公式森林，又或者沉沦在“勾股定理”公式海洋，洋葱学园用“动画课拆解知识点+AI私教随时答疑深度解析+AI定制班制定专属学习规划+拍照学习大师疏通知识本质+游戏化学习机制”精准狙击学习卡点，快速提升成绩。

apps.developer: National Center For Open & Distance Education Limited Company
apps.description:
【华语区开发者必装应用】
App Store“优秀新App”、“教育类精品推荐”、“编程一小时专题”、“学无止境”、“学而不倦”、“学霸的一天”、“精通课业”、“轻松学编程”、“人人能编程”、“助力职场”等专题定期推荐App

慕课网，利用最新的MOOC在线学习形式，建起中国大学校园教育和职场实践间的桥梁，是超酷、前沿的在线教育服务培训平台网站，在中国慕课学习领域独树一帜。无论你深处南海小岛还是沪江小镇，只要网络通畅，随时随地学习，我们帮渴望学习的你成就开发者的梦想，助你成为IT职业圈的精英。

【你学的都是正在用的编程技能】
这里的编程教程，专业、前沿、难度适中，更贴近当前程序员的实际工作。讲师均就职于知名的IT公司，安全教育平台，代码经验丰富。这里不空谈理论，不照搬书本，大牛云集，讲解风趣。
现有课程涵盖HTML/CSS、JS、Swift、jQuery、AngularJS、PHP、JAVA、Vue、Linux、Python、flutter、springboot、docker、React、iOS 、Photoshop、小程序、大数据、云计算等各类开发语言和方向，实工具讲解，紧跟技术头条、新闻热点、敏捷开发、快速更新，专注服务于华人码农。
【实用技能培训】
·你可以把课程缓存在手机里，随时学习，网络畅通时上报同步学习数据；
·播放视频时可以通过手势快进、快退、音量和亮度调节，也可以截屏写笔记；
·支持倍速播放，局部放大等，还有自建课程表，使学习更有效率；
·如果有产品建议或意见，可以到意见反馈界面，产品经理随时待命；

【微信服务号】
搜索：慕课网imooc

【官方微博】

慕课网，利用最新的MOOC在线学习形式，建起中国大学校园教育和职场实践间的桥梁，是超酷、前沿的在线教育服务培训平台网站，在中国慕课学习领域独树一帜。无论你深处南海小岛还是沪江小镇，只要网络通畅，随时随地学习，我们帮渴望学习的你成就开发者的梦想，助你成为IT职业圈的精英。

【你学的都是正在用的编程技能】
这里的编程教程，专业、前沿、难度适中，更贴近当前程序员的实际工作。讲师均就职于知名的IT公司，安全教育平台，代码经验丰富。这里不空谈理论，不照搬书本，大牛云集，讲解风趣。
现有课程涵盖HTML/CSS、JS、Swift、jQuery、AngularJS、PHP、JAVA、Vue、Linux、Python、flutter、springboot、docker、React、iOS 、Photoshop、小程序、大数据、云计算等各类开发语言和方向，实工具讲解，紧跟技术头条、新闻热点、敏捷开发、快速更新，专注服务于华人码农。

apps.title: 3asafeer School: Learn Arabic
apps.description:
*Learn Arabic easily and joyfully!*
3asafeer is the ultimate Arabic learning app for kids, offering a world of leveled Arabic stories, educational cartoons, songs, interactive exercises, and fun games — all designed to build a strong Arabic literacy foundation for native and non-native learners alike.

*Key features include:*

- A rich library of leveled Arabic reading books, gradually increasing in difficulty.

- Educational cartoons and Arabic songs that make learning fun and engaging.

- Interactive exercises, worksheets, and educational games aligned with learning objectives.

- A guided learning journey for non-native students with placement assessments, learning maps, and structured learning paths.

- A gamified experience with points, badges, leaderboards, and exciting reading waves.

- A motivation system that encourages exploration beyond comfort zones, rewarding progress and curiosity.

*Story themes focus on:*

- Universal moral values and emotional intelligence.

- Basic concepts such as numbers, shapes, colors, and animals.

- Engaging early science and STEM topics.

*Perfect for home learning and schools.*
Educators can easily integrate 3asafeer into their curriculum. Join our network of schools and empower your students with the best Arabic literacy platform.

For school licensing or onboarding information, contact us at info@3asafeer.com or WhatsApp us at +971 50 281 0151.

Start your child's Arabic learning journey today — with stories that inspire, games that teach, and experiences that last a lifetime!

raw_data.releaseNotes:
- minor UI/UX improvements.
- stability fixes on connection disruptions.

apps.title: Simpler: English learning app
apps.description:
Learn English Free: Simpler APP is an effective and helpful tool for learn English language free of all levels. English language free for children and adults. 5000 words and grammar!

Simpler features:
- 5000 words and GRAMMAR in the form of short and simple topics 
- Effective DRILLS for each grammar topic
- ASSOCIATIVE word learning. 5000 words and grammar!
- DETECTIVE STORIES: a fun new way to Learn English Free : Simpler APP.
- Authentic LISTENING material
- Free daily access to TREASURE CHESTS with useful new words

Learn English Free : Simpler APP. English language free for children and adults. 5000 words and grammar! Master the English language FOR FREE with SIMPLER!

Simpler has developed an accessible and effective for all-level learners. English language free for children and adults. 5000 words and grammar! English grammar can be confusing and overwhelming. Good news: we've done all the hard work for you. We took the most essential and relevant grammar and broke it down into bite-sized topics complete with drills. Each topic is a simple rule or structure, which comes with an instant comprehension check. With this system you can learn English grammar from the basics, all by yourself.

Learn English Free : Simpler app has created an improved for more effective word learning. English language free for children and adults. 5000 words and grammar! Each flashcard has a sentence which helps memorize the word using associations. The app uses to help you remember every word. Expand your vocabulary fast with Simpler. 

Learn English Free : Simpler knows the importance of and learning the correct pronunciation from the very beginning. That's why every phrase in our exercises is voiced by a native speaker. And in our  section you can put new grammar and vocabulary to use and role play one of the two speakers in a real-life dialogue. 

Practice makes perfect.
You can select and set your DAILY GOAL for extra motivation. Practice regularly and see the effects within a week!

Enjoy thrilling detective stories adapted for English learners! Learn new words and phrases and start thinking in English as you solve crimes and mysteries. 

CONTACT Learn English Free : Simpler APP:
If you have suggestions or comments on Simpler App, please, send them to: help@simpler.link
We appreciate your feedback.

Terms of Use: http://simpler.link/legal
Privacy Policy: http://simpler.link/privacy
